arabic: إن الذي فرض عليك القرآن لرادك إلى معاد ۚ قل ربي أعلم من جاء بالهدى ومن هو في ضلال مبين
english: Verily He Who ordained the Qur'an for thee, will bring thee back to the Place of Return. Say: "My Lord knows best who it is that brings true guidance, and who is in manifest error."
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وما كنت ترجو أن يلقى إليك الكتاب إلا رحمة من ربك ۖ فلا تكونن ظهيرا للكافرين
english: And thou hadst not expected that the Book would be sent to thee except as a Mercy from thy Lord: Therefore lend not thou support in any way to those who reject (Allah's Message).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولا يصدنك عن آيات الله بعد إذ أنزلت إليك ۖ وادع إلى ربك ۖ ولا تكونن من المشركين
english: And let nothing keep thee back from the Signs of Allah after they have been revealed to thee: and invite (men) to thy Lord, and be not of the company of those who join gods with Allah.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولا تدع مع الله إلها آخر ۘ لا إله إلا هو ۚ كل شيء هالك إلا وجهه ۚ له الحكم وإليه ترجعون
english: And call not, besides Allah, on another god. There is no god but He. Everything (that exists) will perish except His own Face. To Him belongs the Command, and to Him will ye (all) be brought back.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الم
english: A. L. M.
tafsir: The Romans have been conquered

arabic: أحسب الناس أن يتركوا أن يقولوا آمنا وهم لا يفتنون
english: Do men think that they will be left alone on saying, "We believe", and that they will not be tested?
tafsir: In the neighbouring land. But having been conquered they will conquer

arabic: ولقد فتنا الذين من قبلهم ۖ فليعلمن الله الذين صدقوا وليعلمن الكاذبين
english: We did test those before them, and Allah will certainly know those who are true from those who are false.
tafsir: In a few years (less than ten). God's is the imperative first and last. On that day the believers will rejoice

arabic: أم حسب الذين يعملون السيئات أن يسبقونا ۚ ساء ما يحكمون
english: Do those who practise evil think that they will get the better of Us? Evil is their judgment!
tafsir: In the help of God. He helps whom He will; He is all-mighty, ever-merciful.

arabic: من كان يرجو لقاء الله فإن أجل الله لآت ۚ وهو السميع العليم
english: For those whose hopes are in the meeting with Allah (in the Hereafter, let them strive); for the term (appointed) by Allah is surely coming and He hears and knows (all things).
tafsir: It is a promise of God; and God does not go back on His promise. Yet most men do not understand:

arabic: ومن جاهد فإنما يجاهد لنفسه ۚ إن الله لغني عن العالمين
english: And if any strive (with might and main), they do so for their own souls: for Allah is free of all needs from all creation.
tafsir: They only know the palpable life of this world, and are oblivious of the Hereafter.

arabic: والذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لنكفرن عنهم سيئاتهم ولنجزينهم أحسن الذي كانوا يعملون
english: Those who believe and work righteous deeds,- from them shall We blot out all evil (that may be) in them, and We shall reward them according to the best of their deeds.
tafsir: Do they not think for themselves that God did not create the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them without reason and a determined purpose? But many men reject the meeting with their Lord.

arabic: ووصينا الإنسان بوالديه حسنا ۖ وإن جاهداك لتشرك بي ما ليس لك به علم فلا تطعهما ۚ إلي مرجعكم فأنبئكم بما كنتم تعملون
english: We have enjoined on man kindness to parents: but if they (either of them) strive (to force) thee to join with Me (in worship) anything of which thou hast no knowledge, obey them not. Ye have (all) to return to me, and I will tell you (the truth) of all that ye did.
tafsir: Have they not travelled on the earth and seen how the others before them had met their end? They were far more powerful than them, furrowed the earth and colonised it far more than they; and their apostles came to them with visible signs. It was surely not for God to wrong them, they wronged themselves.

arabic: والذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لندخلنهم في الصالحين
english: And those who believe and work righteous deeds,- them shall We admit to the company of the Righteous.
tafsir: Therefore evil was the end of those who did evil, for they denied the signs of God and made fun of them.

arabic: ومن الناس من يقول آمنا بالله فإذا أوذي في الله جعل فتنة الناس كعذاب الله ولئن جاء نصر من ربك ليقولن إنا كنا معكم ۚ أوليس الله بأعلم بما في صدور العالمين
english: Then there are among men such as say, "We believe in Allah"; but when they suffer affliction in (the cause of) Allah, they treat men's oppression as if it were the Wrath of Allah! And if help comes (to thee) from thy Lord, they are sure to say, "We have (always) been with you!" Does not Allah know best all that is in the hearts of all creation?
tafsir: God originates creation, and then will revert it, then you will go back to Him.

arabic: وليعلمن الله الذين آمنوا وليعلمن المنافقين
english: And Allah most certainly knows those who believe, and as certainly those who are Hypocrites.
tafsir: The day the Resurrection comes the sinners will be overwhelmed with despair.

arabic: وقال الذين كفروا للذين آمنوا اتبعوا سبيلنا ولنحمل خطاياكم وما هم بحاملين من خطاياهم من شيء ۖ إنهم لكاذبون
english: And the Unbelievers say to those who believe: "Follow our path, and we will bear (the consequences) of your faults." Never in the least will they bear their faults: in fact they are liars!
tafsir: No intercessor will they have among those they associated (with God), and will reject their partners.

arabic: وليحملن أثقالهم وأثقالا مع أثقالهم ۖ وليسألن يوم القيامة عما كانوا يفترون
english: They will bear their own burdens, and (other) burdens along with their own, and on the Day of Judgments they will be called to account for their falsehoods.
tafsir: The day the Hour comes they will be separated into categories.

arabic: ولقد أرسلنا نوحا إلى قومه فلبث فيهم ألف سنة إلا خمسين عاما فأخذهم الطوفان وهم ظالمون
english: We (once) sent Noah to his people, and he tarried among them a thousand years less fifty: but the Deluge overwhelmed them while they (persisted in) sin.
tafsir: Those who believed and did the right will be feasted in a rich, well-watered meadow.

arabic: فأنجيناه وأصحاب السفينة وجعلناها آية للعالمين
english: But We saved him and the companions of the Ark, and We made the (Ark) a Sign for all peoples!
tafsir: Those who did not believe and rejected Our signs and the meeting in the Hereafter, will be given over to punishment.

arabic: وإبراهيم إذ قال لقومه اعبدوا الله واتقوه ۖ ذلكم خير لكم إن كنتم تعلمون
english: And (We also saved) Abraham: behold, he said to his people, "Serve Allah and fear Him: that will be best for you- If ye understand!
tafsir: So extol God when the evening comes and the day dawns,

arabic: إنما تعبدون من دون الله أوثانا وتخلقون إفكا ۚ إن الذين تعبدون من دون الله لا يملكون لكم رزقا فابتغوا عند الله الرزق واعبدوه واشكروا له ۖ إليه ترجعون
english: "For ye do worship idols besides Allah, and ye invent falsehood. The things that ye worship besides Allah have no power to give you sustenance: then seek ye sustenance from Allah, serve Him, and be grateful to Him: to Him will be your return.
tafsir: For His is the praise in the heavens and the earth, -- and at nightfall and the time of noon.

arabic: وإن تكذبوا فقد كذب أمم من قبلكم ۖ وما على الرسول إلا البلاغ المبين
english: "And if ye reject (the Message), so did generations before you: and the duty of the messenger is only to preach publicly (and clearly)."
tafsir: He brings the living from the dead, the dead from the living, and quickens the earth after it had died. So will you be brought forth (from the dead).

arabic: أولم يروا كيف يبدئ الله الخلق ثم يعيده ۚ إن ذلك على الله يسير
english: See they not how Allah originates creation, then repeats it: truly that is easy for Allah.
tafsir: Among His signs is that He created you from the earth, and you are now human beings dispersed everywhere.

arabic: قل سيروا في الأرض فانظروا كيف بدأ الخلق ۚ ثم الله ينشئ النشأة الآخرة ۚ إن الله على كل شيء قدير
english: Say: "Travel through the earth and see how Allah did originate creation; so will Allah produce a later creation: for Allah has power over all things.
tafsir: Another of His signs is that He created mates of your own kind of yourselves so that you may get peace of mind from them, and has put love and compassion between you. Verily there are signs in this for those who reflect.

arabic: يعذب من يشاء ويرحم من يشاء ۖ وإليه تقلبون
english: "He punishes whom He pleases, and He grants Mercy to whom He pleases, and towards Him are ye turned.
tafsir: Among other signs of His is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the variety of your tongues and complexions. Surely there are signs in this for those who understand.

arabic: وما أنتم بمعجزين في الأرض ولا في السماء ۖ وما لكم من دون الله من ولي ولا نصير
english: "Not on earth nor in heaven will ye be able (fleeing) to frustrate (his Plan), nor have ye, besides Allah, any protector or helper."
tafsir: Another of His signs is the night, a time for you to sleep, and the day to seek His bounty. Verily there are signs in this for those who pay heed.

arabic: والذين كفروا بآيات الله ولقائه أولئك يئسوا من رحمتي وأولئك لهم عذاب أليم
english: Those who reject the Signs of Allah and the Meeting with Him (in the Hereafter),- it is they who shall despair of My Mercy: it is they who will (suffer) a most grievous Penalty.
tafsir: Another of His signs is the lightning He shows to fill you both with dread and hope, and the water He sends down from the sky which reawakens the earth that was dead. There are indeed signs in this for those who have sense.

arabic: فما كان جواب قومه إلا أن قالوا اقتلوه أو حرقوه فأنجاه الله من النار ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لقوم يؤمنون
english: So naught was the answer of (Abraham's) people except that they said: "Slay him or burn him." But Allah did save him from the Fire. Verily in this are Signs for people who believe.
tafsir: Another of His signs is that the heavens and the earth stay in position by His command; and then when He will call you once you will come out of the earth.

arabic: وقال إنما اتخذتم من دون الله أوثانا مودة بينكم في الحياة الدنيا ۖ ثم يوم القيامة يكفر بعضكم ببعض ويلعن بعضكم بعضا ومأواكم النار وما لكم من ناصرين
english: And he said: "For you, ye have taken (for worship) idols besides Allah, out of mutual love and regard between yourselves in this life; but on the Day of Judgment ye shall disown each other and curse each other: and your abode will be the Fire, and ye shall have none to help."
tafsir: All those who are in the heavens and the earth are His, and they are all obedient to Him.

arabic: فآمن له لوط ۘ وقال إني مهاجر إلى ربي ۖ إنه هو العزيز الحكيم
english: But Lut had faith in Him: He said: "I will leave home for the sake of my Lord: for He is Exalted in Might, and Wise."
tafsir: It is He who first creates and then reverts it. This is how His law works inevitably. His semblance is of the most sublime in the heavens and the earth. He is all-mighty and all-wise.

arabic: ووهبنا له إسحاق ويعقوب وجعلنا في ذريته النبوة والكتاب وآتيناه أجره في الدنيا ۖ وإنه في الآخرة لمن الصالحين
english: And We gave (Abraham) Isaac and Jacob, and ordained among his progeny Prophethood and Revelation, and We granted him his reward in this life; and he was in the Hereafter (of the company) of the Righteous.
tafsir: He gives you an example from your own life: Do you possess among your dependants any partners in what We have bestowed on you, so that you and they have equal (share) in it, and that you fear them as you fear each other? That is how We explain Our signs clearly for those who comprehend.

arabic: ولوطا إذ قال لقومه إنكم لتأتون الفاحشة ما سبقكم بها من أحد من العالمين
english: And (remember) Lut: behold, he said to his people: "Ye do commit lewdness, such as no people in Creation (ever) committed before you.
tafsir: And yet the wicked follow their own lusts without understanding. Who can show the way to those whom God allows to go astray? None will they have to help them.

arabic: أئنكم لتأتون الرجال وتقطعون السبيل وتأتون في ناديكم المنكر ۖ فما كان جواب قومه إلا أن قالوا ائتنا بعذاب الله إن كنت من الصادقين
english: "Do ye indeed approach men, and cut off the highway?- and practise wickedness (even) in your councils?" But his people gave no answer but this: they said: "Bring us the Wrath of Allah if thou tellest the truth."
tafsir: So keep yourself exclusively on the true way, the creational law of God according to which He created man with the quality of choosing right or wrong. There is no altering of God's creation. This is the supreme law. But most men do not understand.

arabic: قال رب انصرني على القوم المفسدين
english: He said: "O my Lord! help Thou me against people who do mischief!"
tafsir: Turn towards Him and be dutiful to Him; be firm in devotion, and do not become an idolater,

arabic: ولما جاءت رسلنا إبراهيم بالبشرى قالوا إنا مهلكو أهل هذه القرية ۖ إن أهلها كانوا ظالمين
english: When Our Messengers came to Abraham with the good news, they said: "We are indeed going to destroy the people of this township: for truly they are (addicted to) crime."
tafsir: (Or) one of those who created rifts in their order and are divided into sects, with each group exulting in what it has (carved out for itself) --

arabic: قال إن فيها لوطا ۚ قالوا نحن أعلم بمن فيها ۖ لننجينه وأهله إلا امرأته كانت من الغابرين
english: He said: "But there is Lut there." They said: "Well do we know who is there: we will certainly save him and his following,- except his wife: she is of those who lag behind!"
tafsir: When misfortune befalls men they pray to their Lord and turn to Him; but afterwards when He has given them a taste of His benevolence a section of them begins to ascribe compeers to their Lord

arabic: ولما أن جاءت رسلنا لوطا سيء بهم وضاق بهم ذرعا وقالوا لا تخف ولا تحزن ۖ إنا منجوك وأهلك إلا امرأتك كانت من الغابرين
english: And when Our Messengers came to Lut, he was grieved on their account, and felt himself powerless (to protect) them: but they said: "Fear thou not, nor grieve: we are (here) to save thee and thy following, except thy wife: she is of those who lag behind.
tafsir: So as to deny what We have given them. Please yourselves for a time; you will come to know soon.

arabic: إنا منزلون على أهل هذه القرية رجزا من السماء بما كانوا يفسقون
english: "For we are going to bring down on the people of this township a Punishment from heaven, because they have been wickedly rebellious."
tafsir: Have We sent down a charter to them which mentions what they associate with Him?

arabic: ولقد تركنا منها آية بينة لقوم يعقلون
english: And We have left thereof an evident Sign, for any people who (care to) understand.
tafsir: When We give men a taste of Our benevolence they start rejoicing in it. When misfortune befalls them as a result of what they have done themselves, they begin to despair.

arabic: وإلى مدين أخاهم شعيبا فقال يا قوم اعبدوا الله وارجوا اليوم الآخر ولا تعثوا في الأرض مفسدين
english: To the Madyan (people) (We sent) their brother Shu'aib. Then he said: "O my people! serve Allah, and fear the Last Day: nor commit evil on the earth, with intent to do mischief."
tafsir: Do they not see God increases or decreases the means of whosoever He please? Verily there are signs in this for those who believe.

arabic: فكذبوه فأخذتهم الرجفة فأصبحوا في دارهم جاثمين
english: But they rejected him: Then the mighty Blast seized them, and they lay prostrate in their homes by the morning.
tafsir: So, give their share to the relatives, the needy, and the wayfarers. This is best for those who seek the way that leads to God, and they will be successful.

arabic: وعادا وثمود وقد تبين لكم من مساكنهم ۖ وزين لهم الشيطان أعمالهم فصدهم عن السبيل وكانوا مستبصرين
english: (Remember also) the 'Ad and the Thamud (people): clearly will appear to you from (the traces) of their buildings (their fate): the Evil One made their deeds alluring to them, and kept them back from the Path, though they were gifted with intelligence and skill.
tafsir: What you give on interest to increase (your capital) through others' wealth, does not find increase with God; yet what you give (in alms and charity) with a pure heart, seeking the way of God, will be doubled.

arabic: وقارون وفرعون وهامان ۖ ولقد جاءهم موسى بالبينات فاستكبروا في الأرض وما كانوا سابقين
english: (Remember also) Qarun, Pharaoh, and Haman: there came to them Moses with Clear Signs, but they behaved with insolence on the earth; yet they could not overreach (Us).
tafsir: It is God who created you, then gave you sustenance, then He will make you die, and bring you back to life. Is there one among those you associate with Him who can do the least of these things? Too high and exalted is He for what they associate with Him!

arabic: فكلا أخذنا بذنبه ۖ فمنهم من أرسلنا عليه حاصبا ومنهم من أخذته الصيحة ومنهم من خسفنا به الأرض ومنهم من أغرقنا ۚ وما كان الله ليظلمهم ولكن كانوا أنفسهم يظلمون
english: Each one of them We seized for his crime: of them, against some We sent a violent tornado (with showers of stones); some were caught by a (mighty) Blast; some We caused the earth to swallow up; and some We drowned (in the waters): It was not Allah Who injured (or oppressed) them:" They injured (and oppressed) their own souls.
tafsir: Corruption has spread over land and sea from what men have done themselves that they may taste a little of what they have done: They may haply come back (to the right path).

arabic: مثل الذين اتخذوا من دون الله أولياء كمثل العنكبوت اتخذت بيتا ۖ وإن أوهن البيوت لبيت العنكبوت ۖ لو كانوا يعلمون
english: The parable of those who take protectors other than Allah is that of the spider, who builds (to itself) a house; but truly the flimsiest of houses is the spider's house;- if they but knew.
tafsir: Say: "Travel on the earth and see how came the end of those before you." Most of them were idolaters.

arabic: إن الله يعلم ما يدعون من دونه من شيء ۚ وهو العزيز الحكيم
english: Verily Allah doth know of (every thing) whatever that they call upon besides Him: and He is Exalted (in power), Wise.
tafsir: So set your face towards the straight path before the day arrives from God which is irreversible. Men will be segregated on that day.

arabic: وتلك الأمثال نضربها للناس ۖ وما يعقلها إلا العالمون
english: And such are the Parables We set forth for mankind, but only those understand them who have knowledge.
tafsir: So that he who disbelieves will bear the consequence of his unbelief; and he who does the right will straighten out the way for himself,

arabic: خلق الله السماوات والأرض بالحق ۚ إن في ذلك لآية للمؤمنين
english: Allah created the heavens and the earth in true (proportions): verily in that is a Sign for those who believe.
tafsir: So that God may reward those who believed and did what was good, by His grace. Surely He does not love unbelievers.

arabic: اتل ما أوحي إليك من الكتاب وأقم الصلاة ۖ إن الصلاة تنهى عن الفحشاء والمنكر ۗ ولذكر الله أكبر ۗ والله يعلم ما تصنعون
english: Recite what is sent of the Book by inspiration to thee, and establish regular Prayer: for Prayer restrains from shameful and unjust deeds; and remembrance of Allah is the greatest (thing in life) without doubt. And Allah knows the (deeds) that ye do.
tafsir: Among His signs are the breezes He sends as harbingers of happy news, so that He may allow you to taste of His mercy, and that ships may sail by His command, and you may seek of His bounty, and may haply be grateful.

arabic: ولا تجادلوا أهل الكتاب إلا بالتي هي أحسن إلا الذين ظلموا منهم ۖ وقولوا آمنا بالذي أنزل إلينا وأنزل إليكم وإلهنا وإلهكم واحد ونحن له مسلمون
english: And dispute ye not with the People of the Book, except with means better (than mere disputation), unless it be with those of them who inflict wrong (and injury): but say, "We believe in the revelation which has come down to us and in that which came down to you; Our Allah and your Allah is one; and it is to Him we bow (in Islam)."
tafsir: Verily We sent many apostles before you to their people, who brought clear signs with them. Then We retributed those who were sinful. It is a duty incumbent on Us to help the believers.

arabic: وكذلك أنزلنا إليك الكتاب ۚ فالذين آتيناهم الكتاب يؤمنون به ۖ ومن هؤلاء من يؤمن به ۚ وما يجحد بآياتنا إلا الكافرون
english: And thus (it is) that We have sent down the Book to thee. So the People of the Book believe therein, as also do some of these (pagan Arabs): and none but Unbelievers reject our signs.
tafsir: It is God who sends the breezes that raise clouds, then spreads them over the sky as He please, fold on fold, then you see the drops of rain issue from between them. When He sends it down to those of His creatures as He will, they are filled with joy,

arabic: وما كنت تتلو من قبله من كتاب ولا تخطه بيمينك ۖ إذا لارتاب المبطلون
english: And thou wast not (able) to recite a Book before this (Book came), nor art thou (able) to transcribe it with thy right hand: In that case, indeed, would the talkers of vanities have doubted.
tafsir: Although before it came down they were despondent.

arabic: بل هو آيات بينات في صدور الذين أوتوا العلم ۚ وما يجحد بآياتنا إلا الظالمون
english: Nay, here are Signs self-evident in the hearts of those endowed with knowledge: and none but the unjust reject Our Signs.
tafsir: So consider the signs of His benevolence: How He quickens the earth after it had become waste. He is verily the one who will raise the dead. He has power over everything.

arabic: وقالوا لولا أنزل عليه آيات من ربه ۖ قل إنما الآيات عند الله وإنما أنا نذير مبين
english: Ye they say: "Why are not Signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say: "The signs are indeed with Allah: and I am indeed a clear Warner."
tafsir: If We send a (blighting) wind and they see (the earth) seared autumnal, they would surely become ungrateful.

arabic: أولم يكفهم أنا أنزلنا عليك الكتاب يتلى عليهم ۚ إن في ذلك لرحمة وذكرى لقوم يؤمنون
english: And is it not enough for them that we have sent down to thee the Book which is rehearsed to them? Verily, in it is Mercy and a Reminder to those who believe.
tafsir: You cannot make the dead to listen nor the deaf hear the call when they have turned back and retreated,

arabic: قل كفى بالله بيني وبينكم شهيدا ۖ يعلم ما في السماوات والأرض ۗ والذين آمنوا بالباطل وكفروا بالله أولئك هم الخاسرون
english: Say: "Enough is Allah for a witness between me and you: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth. And it is those who believe in vanities and reject Allah, that will perish (in the end).
tafsir: Nor can you make the blind see the way when they have gone astray. You can make none hear except those who believe Our signs and have come to submission.

arabic: ويستعجلونك بالعذاب ۚ ولولا أجل مسمى لجاءهم العذاب وليأتينهم بغتة وهم لا يشعرون
english: They ask thee to hasten on the Punishment (for them): had it not been for a term (of respite) appointed, the Punishment would certainly have come to them: and it will certainly reach them,- of a sudden, while they perceive not!
tafsir: It is God who created you of weakness, then after weakness gave you strength, then after strength will give you weakness and grey hair. Surely He makes whatever He wills. He is all-knowing and all-powerful.

arabic: يستعجلونك بالعذاب وإن جهنم لمحيطة بالكافرين
english: They ask thee to hasten on the Punishment: but, of a surety, Hell will encompass the Rejecters of Faith!-
tafsir: The day Resurrection is set the sinners will swear: "We did not tarry more than an hour (and cannot be guilty)." That is how they have always been deceived.

arabic: يوم يغشاهم العذاب من فوقهم ومن تحت أرجلهم ويقول ذوقوا ما كنتم تعملون
english: On the Day that the Punishment shall cover them from above them and from below them, and (a Voice) shall say: "Taste ye (the fruits) of your deeds!"
tafsir: But those who were given the knowledge and belief will say: "You have tarried, according to the Book of God, as long as the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection, but 'you do not know."

arabic: يا عبادي الذين آمنوا إن أرضي واسعة فإياي فاعبدون
english: O My servants who believe! truly, spacious is My Earth: therefore serve ye Me - (and Me alone)!
tafsir: Their excuses will be of no avail to the sinners on that day, and they will not be allowed to beg for favour.

arabic: كل نفس ذائقة الموت ۖ ثم إلينا ترجعون
english: Every soul shall have a taste of death in the end to Us shall ye be brought back.
tafsir: We have offered every kind of example here in this Qur'an to men. Even then if you bring a verse to them, those who disbelieve say: "You are nothing but a liar."

arabic: والذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لنبوئنهم من الجنة غرفا تجري من تحتها الأنهار خالدين فيها ۚ نعم أجر العاملين
english: But those who believe and work deeds of righteousness - to them shall We give a Home in Heaven,- lofty mansions beneath which flow rivers,- to dwell therein for aye;- an excellent reward for those who do (good)!-
tafsir: That is how God seals the hearts of those who do not know.

arabic: الذين صبروا وعلى ربهم يتوكلون
english: Those who persevere in patience, and put their trust, in their Lord and Cherisher.
tafsir: So have patience. The promise of God is surely true; and let not those who do not believe make you relax (your endeavours).

arabic: وكأين من دابة لا تحمل رزقها الله يرزقها وإياكم ۚ وهو السميع العليم
english: How many are the creatures that carry not their own sustenance? It is Allah who feeds (both) them and you: for He hears and knows (all things).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولئن سألتهم من خلق السماوات والأرض وسخر الشمس والقمر ليقولن الله ۖ فأنى يؤفكون
english: If indeed thou ask them who has created the heavens and the earth and subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law), they will certainly reply, "Allah". How are they then deluded away (from the truth)?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: الله يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء من عباده ويقدر له ۚ إن الله بكل شيء عليم
english: Allah enlarges the sustenance (which He gives) to whichever of His servants He pleases; and He (similarly) grants by (strict) measure, (as He pleases): for Allah has full knowledge of all things.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولئن سألتهم من نزل من السماء ماء فأحيا به الأرض من بعد موتها ليقولن الله ۚ قل الحمد لله ۚ بل أكثرهم لا يعقلون
english: And if indeed thou ask them who it is that sends down rain from the sky, and gives life therewith to the earth after its death, they will certainly reply, "Allah!" Say, "Praise be to Allah!" But most of them understand not.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وما هذه الحياة الدنيا إلا لهو ولعب ۚ وإن الدار الآخرة لهي الحيوان ۚ لو كانوا يعلمون
english: What is the life of this world but amusement and play? but verily the Home in the Hereafter,- that is life indeed, if they but knew.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فإذا ركبوا في الفلك دعوا الله مخلصين له الدين فلما نجاهم إلى البر إذا هم يشركون
english: Now, if they embark on a boat, they call on Allah, making their devotion sincerely (and exclusively) to Him; but when He has delivered them safely to (dry) land, behold, they give a share (of their worship to others)!-
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ليكفروا بما آتيناهم وليتمتعوا ۖ فسوف يعلمون
english: Disdaining ungratefully Our gifts, and giving themselves up to (worldly) enjoyment! But soon will they know.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: أولم يروا أنا جعلنا حرما آمنا ويتخطف الناس من حولهم ۚ أفبالباطل يؤمنون وبنعمة الله يكفرون
english: Do they not then see that We have made a sanctuary secure, and that men are being snatched away from all around them? Then, do they believe in that which is vain, and reject the Grace of Allah?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ومن أظلم ممن افترى على الله كذبا أو كذب بالحق لما جاءه ۚ أليس في جهنم مثوى للكافرين
english: And who does more wrong than he who invents a lie against Allah or rejects the Truth when it reaches him? Is there not a home in Hell for those who reject Faith?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: والذين جاهدوا فينا لنهدينهم سبلنا ۚ وإن الله لمع المحسنين
english: And those who strive in Our (cause),- We will certainly guide them to our Paths: For verily Allah is with those who do right.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الم
english: A. L. M.
tafsir: These are the verses of the sagacious Book,

arabic: غلبت الروم
english: The Roman Empire has been defeated-
tafsir: And a guidance and grace for those who do good,

arabic: في أدنى الأرض وهم من بعد غلبهم سيغلبون
english: In a land close by; but they, (even) after (this) defeat of theirs, will soon be victorious-
tafsir: Who are constant in devotion, pay the zakat, and are certain of the Hereafter.

arabic: في بضع سنين ۗ لله الأمر من قبل ومن بعد ۚ ويومئذ يفرح المؤمنون
english: Within a few years. With Allah is the Decision, in the past and in the Future: on that Day shall the Believers rejoice-
tafsir: They are on guidance from their Lord, and will prosper.

arabic: بنصر الله ۚ ينصر من يشاء ۖ وهو العزيز الرحيم
english: With the help of Allah. He helps whom He will, and He is exalted in might, most merciful.
tafsir: But among men are also those who spread frivolous stories to mislead (others) from the way of God, without any knowledge, and take it lightly. For such as these the nemesis will be shameful.

arabic: وعد الله ۖ لا يخلف الله وعده ولكن أكثر الناس لا يعلمون
english: (It is) the promise of Allah. Never does Allah depart from His promise: but most men understand not.
tafsir: When Our verses are recited before them they turn away haughtily as though they did not hear them, as if a deafness had come into their ears. So give them tidings of a shameful punishment.

arabic: يعلمون ظاهرا من الحياة الدنيا وهم عن الآخرة هم غافلون
english: They know but the outer (things) in the life of this world: but of the End of things they are heedless.
tafsir: Surely for those who believe and do the right are pleasure gardens.

arabic: أولم يتفكروا في أنفسهم ۗ ما خلق الله السماوات والأرض وما بينهما إلا بالحق وأجل مسمى ۗ وإن كثيرا من الناس بلقاء ربهم لكافرون
english: Do they not reflect in their own minds? Not but for just ends and for a term appointed, did Allah create the heavens and the earth, and all between them: yet are there truly many among men who deny the meeting with their Lord (at the Resurrection)!
tafsir: They will abide in them for ever. The promise of God is true; and He is all-mighty and all-wise.

arabic: أولم يسيروا في الأرض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبلهم ۚ كانوا أشد منهم قوة وأثاروا الأرض وعمروها أكثر مما عمروها وجاءتهم رسلهم بالبينات ۖ فما كان الله ليظلمهم ولكن كانوا أنفسهم يظلمون
english: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the end of those before them? They were superior to them in strength: they tilled the soil and populated it in greater numbers than these have done: there came to them their messengers with Clear (Signs). (Which they rejected, to their own destruction): It was not Allah Who wronged them, but they wronged their own souls.
tafsir: He created the skies without a support, as you can see, and placed stabilisers in the earth that you may dwell at ease as it revolves; and dispersed on it all varieties of creatures, and He sent down water from the skies and grew all kinds of splendid things upon it.

arabic: ثم كان عاقبة الذين أساءوا السوأى أن كذبوا بآيات الله وكانوا بها يستهزئون
english: In the long run evil in the extreme will be the End of those who do evil; for that they rejected the Signs of Allah, and held them up to ridicule.
tafsir: Such is God's creation. Show me now what those (they worship) beside Him have created. Surely the evil-doers are in clear error.

arabic: الله يبدأ الخلق ثم يعيده ثم إليه ترجعون
english: It is Allah Who begins (the process of) creation; then repeats it; then shall ye be brought back to Him.
tafsir: We bestowed wisdom on Luqman that he may be grateful to God. Whosoever is grateful is so for his own good, and whoever is ungrateful (should remember) that God is above all concern, worthy of praise.

arabic: ويوم تقوم الساعة يبلس المجرمون
english: On the Day that the Hour will be established, the guilty will be struck dumb with despair.
tafsir: (Remember) when Luqman counselled his son: "O son, do not associate any one with God. To associate others with God is a grievous wrong."

arabic: ولم يكن لهم من شركائهم شفعاء وكانوا بشركائهم كافرين
english: No intercessor will they have among their "Partners" and they will (themselves) reject their "Partners".
tafsir: We have committed man about his parents. His mother carries him in her womb in weakness and debility, weaning him in two years. So he should be grateful to Me and his parents. To Me is the journeying back.

arabic: ويوم تقوم الساعة يومئذ يتفرقون
english: On the Day that the Hour will be established,- that Day shall (all men) be sorted out.
tafsir: If they try to force you to associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. Live with them honourably in the world, but follow the way of him who turns to Me. Your returning is to Me in the end, when I will tell you what you did.

arabic: فأما الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات فهم في روضة يحبرون
english: Then those who have believed and worked righteous deeds, shall be made happy in a Mead of Delight.
tafsir: "O my son, whatsoever it may be, even though equal to a mustard seed in weight, or within a rock or in the sky or in the earth, God will bring it forth. Verily God is perceptive, all-aware.

arabic: وأما الذين كفروا وكذبوا بآياتنا ولقاء الآخرة فأولئك في العذاب محضرون
english: And those who have rejected Faith and falsely denied our Signs and the meeting of the Hereafter,- such shall be brought forth to Punishment.
tafsir: O my son, fulfil your moral obligations, bid what is known to be right and forbid what is wrong, and bear with patience what befalls you. These are indeed acts of courage and resolve.

arabic: فسبحان الله حين تمسون وحين تصبحون
english: So (give) glory to Allah, when ye reach eventide and when ye rise in the morning;
tafsir: Do not hold men in contempt, and do not walk with hauteur on the earth. Verily God does not like the proud and boastful.

arabic: وله الحمد في السماوات والأرض وعشيا وحين تظهرون
english: Yea, to Him be praise, in the heavens and on earth; and in the late afternoon and when the day begins to decline.
tafsir: Be moderate in your bearing, and keep your voice low. Surely the most repulsive voice is the donkey's."

arabic: يخرج الحي من الميت ويخرج الميت من الحي ويحيي الأرض بعد موتها ۚ وكذلك تخرجون
english: It is He Who brings out the living from the dead, and brings out the dead from the living, and Who gives life to the earth after it is dead: and thus shall ye be brought out (from the dead).
tafsir: Have you not seen that God has subjugated what is in the heavens and the earth to you, and bestowed His favours, external and esoteric, in abundance on you? And yet there are men who contend about God without any knowledge or guidance or the Book enlightening.

arabic: ومن آياته أن خلقكم من تراب ثم إذا أنتم بشر تنتشرون
english: Among His Signs in this, that He created you from dust; and then,- behold, ye are men scattered (far and wide)!
tafsir: When you ask them to follow what God has revealed, they say: "No. We shall follow what we found our ancestors following," even though the devil were calling them to the torment of Hell!

arabic: ومن آياته أن خلق لكم من أنفسكم أزواجا لتسكنوا إليها وجعل بينكم مودة ورحمة ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لقوم يتفكرون
english: And among His Signs is this, that He created for you mates from among yourselves, that ye may dwell in tranquillity with them, and He has put love and mercy between your (hearts): verily in that are Signs for those who reflect.
tafsir: He who turns his face to God in submission and does good, holds fast to a handle that is strong; for the resultance of things rests with God.

arabic: ومن آياته خلق السماوات والأرض واختلاف ألسنتكم وألوانكم ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات للعالمين
english: And among His Signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the variations in your languages and your colours: verily in that are Signs for those who know.
tafsir: So do not let the unbelief of disbelievers grieve you. They will be brought back to Us, when We shall tell them what they used to do. Whatever is in their hearts is known to God.

arabic: ومن آياته منامكم بالليل والنهار وابتغاؤكم من فضله ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لقوم يسمعون
english: And among His Signs is the sleep that ye take by night and by day, and the quest that ye (make for livelihood) out of His Bounty: verily in that are signs for those who hearken.
tafsir: We let them enjoy themselves only for a while, then We shall drag them to a severe punishment.

arabic: ومن آياته يريكم البرق خوفا وطمعا وينزل من السماء ماء فيحيي به الأرض بعد موتها ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لقوم يعقلون
english: And among His Signs, He shows you the lightning, by way both of fear and of hope, and He sends down rain from the sky and with it gives life to the earth after it is dead: verily in that are Signs for those who are wise.
tafsir: If you ask them: "Who created the heavens and the earth?" They will surely answer: "God." Say: "All praise be to God." But most of them do not understand.

arabic: ومن آياته أن تقوم السماء والأرض بأمره ۚ ثم إذا دعاكم دعوة من الأرض إذا أنتم تخرجون
english: And among His Signs is this, that heaven and earth stand by His Command: then when He calls you, by a single call, from the earth, behold, ye (straightway) come forth.
tafsir: To God belongs what is in the heavens and the earth. Verily He is all-sufficient, worthy of praise.

arabic: وله من في السماوات والأرض ۖ كل له قانتون
english: To Him belongs every being that is in the heavens and on earth: all are devoutly obedient to Him.
tafsir: If all the trees of the earth were pens and the oceans ink, with many more oceans for replenishing them, the colloquy of God would never come to end. He is indeed all-mighty and all-wise.

arabic: وهو الذي يبدأ الخلق ثم يعيده وهو أهون عليه ۚ وله المثل الأعلى في السماوات والأرض ۚ وهو العزيز الحكيم
english: It is He Who begins (the process of) creation; then repeats it; and for Him it is most easy. To Him belongs the loftiest similitude (we can think of) in the heavens and the earth: for He is Exalted in Might, full of wisdom.
tafsir: Your creation and resurrection is but like that of a single cell. Verily He is all-hearing and all-seeing.

arabic: ضرب لكم مثلا من أنفسكم ۖ هل لكم من ما ملكت أيمانكم من شركاء في ما رزقناكم فأنتم فيه سواء تخافونهم كخيفتكم أنفسكم ۚ كذلك نفصل الآيات لقوم يعقلون
english: He does propound to you a similitude from your own (experience): do ye have partners among those whom your right hands possess, to share as equals in the wealth We have bestowed on you? Do ye fear them as ye fear each other? Thus do we explain the Signs in detail to a people that understand.
tafsir: Do you not see that God makes the night succeed the day, the day succeed the night? And He has harnessed the sun and the moon so that each runs its appointed course. Surely God is aware of all you do.

arabic: بل اتبع الذين ظلموا أهواءهم بغير علم ۖ فمن يهدي من أضل الله ۖ وما لهم من ناصرين
english: Nay, the wrong-doers (merely) follow their own lusts, being devoid of knowledge. But who will guide those whom Allah leaves astray? To them there will be no helpers.
tafsir: That is so for God is the Reality, and what they invoke other than Him is illusion. Indeed God is all-high and supreme.

arabic: فأقم وجهك للدين حنيفا ۚ فطرت الله التي فطر الناس عليها ۚ لا تبديل لخلق الله ۚ ذلك الدين القيم ولكن أكثر الناس لا يعلمون
english: So set thou thy face steadily and truly to the Faith: (establish) Allah's handiwork according to the pattern on which He has made mankind: no change (let there be) in the work (wrought) by Allah: that is the standard Religion: but most among mankind understand not.
tafsir: Do you not see that the ships sail in the ocean by the grace of God, that He may show you some of His glories. Verily there are signs in this for those who are constant and give thanks.

arabic: منيبين إليه واتقوه وأقيموا الصلاة ولا تكونوا من المشركين
english: Turn ye back in repentance to Him, and fear Him: establish regular prayers, and be not ye among those who join gods with Allah,-
tafsir: When the waves overshadow them like a canopy, they pray to God with all-exclusive faith in Him. But after He has safely brought them to the shore, there are some who vacillate between doubt and belief, but no one rejects Our signs except those who are perverse and disbelieve.

arabic: من الذين فرقوا دينهم وكانوا شيعا ۖ كل حزب بما لديهم فرحون
english: Those who split up their Religion, and become (mere) Sects,- each party rejoicing in that which is with itself!
tafsir: O people, fear your Lord and dread the day when no father will avail a son, nor son his father. Truly the promise of God is true. Do not be deluded by the life of this world, and do not let the deceiver draw you away from God.

arabic: وإذا مس الناس ضر دعوا ربهم منيبين إليه ثم إذا أذاقهم منه رحمة إذا فريق منهم بربهم يشركون
english: When trouble touches men, they cry to their Lord, turning back to Him in repentance: but when He gives them a taste of Mercy as from Himself, behold, some of them pay part-worship to other god's besides their Lord,-
tafsir: Only God has the knowledge of the Hour. He sends rain from the heavens, and knows what is in the mothers' wombs. No one knows what he will do on the morrow; no one knows in what land he will die. Surely God knows and is cognisant.

arabic: ليكفروا بما آتيناهم ۚ فتمتعوا فسوف تعلمون
english: (As if) to show their ingratitude for the (favours) We have bestowed on them! Then enjoy (your brief day); but soon will ye know (your folly).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: أم أنزلنا عليهم سلطانا فهو يتكلم بما كانوا به يشركون
english: Or have We sent down authority to them, which points out to them the things to which they pay part-worship?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وإذا أذقنا الناس رحمة فرحوا بها ۖ وإن تصبهم سيئة بما قدمت أيديهم إذا هم يقنطون
english: When We give men a taste of Mercy, they exult thereat: and when some evil afflicts them because of what their (own) hands have sent forth, behold, they are in despair!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: أولم يروا أن الله يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لقوم يؤمنون
english: See they not that Allah enlarges the provision and restricts it, to whomsoever He pleases? Verily in that are Signs for those who believe.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فآت ذا القربى حقه والمسكين وابن السبيل ۚ ذلك خير للذين يريدون وجه الله ۖ وأولئك هم المفلحون
english: So give what is due to kindred, the needy, and the wayfarer. That is best for those who seek the Countenance, of Allah, and it is they who will prosper.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وما آتيتم من ربا ليربو في أموال الناس فلا يربو عند الله ۖ وما آتيتم من زكاة تريدون وجه الله فأولئك هم المضعفون
english: That which ye lay out for increase through the property of (other) people, will have no increase with Allah: but that which ye lay out for charity, seeking the Countenance of Allah, (will increase): it is these who will get a recompense multiplied.

arabic: الله الذي خلقكم ثم رزقكم ثم يميتكم ثم يحييكم ۖ هل من شركائكم من يفعل من ذلكم من شيء ۚ سبحانه وتعالى عما يشركون
english: It is Allah Who has created you: further, He has provided for your sustenance; then He will cause you to die; and again He will give you life. Are there any of your (false) "Partners" who can do any single one of these things? Glory to Him! and high is He above the partners they attribute (to him)!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ظهر الفساد في البر والبحر بما كسبت أيدي الناس ليذيقهم بعض الذي عملوا لعلهم يرجعون
english: Mischief has appeared on land and sea because of (the meed) that the hands of men have earned, that (Allah) may give them a taste of some of their deeds: in order that they may turn back (from Evil).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: قل سيروا في الأرض فانظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبل ۚ كان أكثرهم مشركين
english: Say: "Travel through the earth and see what was the end of those before (you): Most of them worshipped others besides Allah."
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فأقم وجهك للدين القيم من قبل أن يأتي يوم لا مرد له من الله ۖ يومئذ يصدعون
english: But set thou thy face to the right Religion before there come from Allah the Day which there is no chance of averting: on that Day shall men be divided (in two).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: من كفر فعليه كفره ۖ ومن عمل صالحا فلأنفسهم يمهدون
english: Those who reject Faith will suffer from that rejection: and those who work righteousness will spread their couch (of repose) for themselves (in heaven):

english: That He may reward those who believe and work righteous deeds, out of his Bounty. For He loves not those who reject Faith.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ومن آياته أن يرسل الرياح مبشرات وليذيقكم من رحمته ولتجري الفلك بأمره ولتبتغوا من فضله ولعلكم تشكرون
english: Among His Signs is this, that He sends the Winds, as heralds of Glad Tidings, giving you a taste of His (Grace and) Mercy,- that the ships may sail (majestically) by His Command and that ye may seek of His Bounty: in order that ye may be grateful.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولقد أرسلنا من قبلك رسلا إلى قومهم فجاءوهم بالبينات فانتقمنا من الذين أجرموا ۖ وكان حقا علينا نصر المؤمنين
english: We did indeed send, before thee, messengers to their (respective) peoples, and they came to them with Clear Signs: then, to those who transgressed, We meted out Retribution: and it was due from Us to aid those who believed.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: الله الذي يرسل الرياح فتثير سحابا فيبسطه في السماء كيف يشاء ويجعله كسفا فترى الودق يخرج من خلاله ۖ فإذا أصاب به من يشاء من عباده إذا هم يستبشرون
english: It is Allah Who sends the Winds, and they raise the Clouds: then does He spread them in the sky as He wills, and break them into fragments, until thou seest rain-drops issue from the midst thereof: then when He has made them reach such of his servants as He wills behold, they do rejoice!-
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وإن كانوا من قبل أن ينزل عليهم من قبله لمبلسين
english: Even though, before they received (the rain) - just before this - they were dumb with despair!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فانظر إلى آثار رحمت الله كيف يحيي الأرض بعد موتها ۚ إن ذلك لمحيي الموتى ۖ وهو على كل شيء قدير
english: Then contemplate (O man!) the memorials of Allah's Mercy!- how He gives life to the earth after its death: verily the same will give life to the men who are dead: for He has power over all things.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولئن أرسلنا ريحا فرأوه مصفرا لظلوا من بعده يكفرون
english: And if We (but) send a Wind from which they see (their tilth) turn yellow,- behold, they become, thereafter, Ungrateful (Unbelievers)!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فإنك لا تسمع الموتى ولا تسمع الصم الدعاء إذا ولوا مدبرين
english: So verily thou canst not make the dead to hear, nor canst thou make the deaf to hear the call, when they show their backs and turn away.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وما أنت بهاد العمي عن ضلالتهم ۖ إن تسمع إلا من يؤمن بآياتنا فهم مسلمون
english: Nor canst thou lead back the blind from their straying: only those wilt thou make to hear, who believe in Our signs and submit (their wills in Islam).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: الله الذي خلقكم من ضعف ثم جعل من بعد ضعف قوة ثم جعل من بعد قوة ضعفا وشيبة ۚ يخلق ما يشاء ۖ وهو العليم القدير
english: It is Allah Who created you in a state of (helpless) weakness, then gave (you) strength after weakness, then, after strength, gave (you weakness and a hoary head: He creates as He wills, and it is He Who has all knowledge and power.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ويوم تقوم الساعة يقسم المجرمون ما لبثوا غير ساعة ۚ كذلك كانوا يؤفكون
english: On the Day that the Hour (of Reckoning) will be established, the transgressors will swear that they tarried not but an hour: thus were they used to being deluded!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وقال الذين أوتوا العلم والإيمان لقد لبثتم في كتاب الله إلى يوم البعث ۖ فهذا يوم البعث ولكنكم كنتم لا تعلمون
english: But those endued with knowledge and faith will say: "Indeed ye did tarry, within Allah's Decree, to the Day of Resurrection, and this is the Day of Resurrection: but ye - ye were not aware!"
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فيومئذ لا ينفع الذين ظلموا معذرتهم ولا هم يستعتبون
english: So on that Day no excuse of theirs will avail the transgressors, nor will they be invited (then) to seek grace (by repentance).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولقد ضربنا للناس في هذا القرآن من كل مثل ۚ ولئن جئتهم بآية ليقولن الذين كفروا إن أنتم إلا مبطلون
english: verily We have propounded for men, in this Qur'an every kind of Parable: But if thou bring to them any Sign, the Unbelievers are sure to say, "Ye do nothing but talk vanities."
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: كذلك يطبع الله على قلوب الذين لا يعلمون
english: Thus does Allah seal up the hearts of those who understand not.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فاصبر إن وعد الله حق ۖ ولا يستخفنك الذين لا يوقنون
english: So patiently persevere: for verily the promise of Allah is true: nor let those shake thy firmness, who have (themselves) no certainty of faith.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الم
english: A. L. M.
tafsir: The revelation of this Book free of doubt and involution is from the Lord of all the worlds.

arabic: تلك آيات الكتاب الحكيم
english: These are Verses of the Wise Book,-
tafsir: Or do they say he has fabricated it? In fact, it is the truth from your Lord so that you may warn the people to whom no admonisher was sent before you. They may haply come to guidance.

arabic: هدى ورحمة للمحسنين
english: A Guide and a Mercy to the Doers of Good,-
tafsir: It is God who created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, in six spans, then assumed all authority. You have no protector other than Him, nor any intercessor. Will you not be warned even then?

arabic: الذين يقيمون الصلاة ويؤتون الزكاة وهم بالآخرة هم يوقنون
english: Those who establish regular Prayer, and give regular Charity, and have (in their hearts) the assurance of the Hereafter.
tafsir: He regulates all affairs from high to low, then they rise to perfection step by step in a (heavenly) day whose measure is a thousand years of your reckoning.

arabic: أولئك على هدى من ربهم ۖ وأولئك هم المفلحون
english: These are on (true) guidance from their Lord: and these are the ones who will prosper.
tafsir: Such is (He) the knower of the unknown and the known, the mighty and the merciful,

arabic: ومن الناس من يشتري لهو الحديث ليضل عن سبيل الله بغير علم ويتخذها هزوا ۚ أولئك لهم عذاب مهين
english: But there are, among men, those who purchase idle tales, without knowledge (or meaning), to mislead (men) from the Path of Allah and throw ridicule (on the Path): for such there will be a Humiliating Penalty.
tafsir: Who made all things He created excellent; and first fashioned man from clay,

arabic: وإذا تتلى عليه آياتنا ولى مستكبرا كأن لم يسمعها كأن في أذنيه وقرا ۖ فبشره بعذاب أليم
english: When Our Signs are rehearsed to such a one, he turns away in arrogance, as if he heard them not, as if there were deafness in both his ears: announce to him a grievous Penalty.
tafsir: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,

arabic: إن الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم جنات النعيم
english: For those who believe and work righteous deeds, there will be Gardens of Bliss,-
tafsir: Then proportioned and breathed into him of His spirit, and gave you the senses of hearing, sight and feeling. And yet how little are the thanks you offer!

arabic: خالدين فيها ۖ وعد الله حقا ۚ وهو العزيز الحكيم
english: To dwell therein. The promise of Allah is true: and He is Exalted in Power, Wise.
tafsir: But they say: "When we have mingled with the earth, shall we be created anew?" In fact they deny the meeting with their Lord.

arabic: خلق السماوات بغير عمد ترونها ۖ وألقى في الأرض رواسي أن تميد بكم وبث فيها من كل دابة ۚ وأنزلنا من السماء ماء فأنبتنا فيها من كل زوج كريم
english: He created the heavens without any pillars that ye can see; He set on the earth mountains standing firm, lest it should shake with you; and He scattered through it beasts of all kinds. We send down rain from the sky, and produce on the earth every kind of noble creature, in pairs.
tafsir: Say: "The angel of death appointed over you will take away your soul, then you will be sent back to your Lord."

arabic: هذا خلق الله فأروني ماذا خلق الذين من دونه ۚ بل الظالمون في ضلال مبين
english: Such is the Creation of Allah: now show Me what is there that others besides Him have created: nay, but the Transgressors are in manifest error.
tafsir: If only you could see when the sinners will stand before their Lord, heads hung low, (and say:) "O Lord, we have seen and heard. So send us back. We shall do the right, for we have come to believe with certainty."

arabic: ولقد آتينا لقمان الحكمة أن اشكر لله ۚ ومن يشكر فإنما يشكر لنفسه ۖ ومن كفر فإن الله غني حميد
english: we bestowed (in the past) Wisdom on Luqman: "Show (thy) gratitude to Allah." Any who is (so) grateful does so to the profit of his own soul: but if any is ungrateful, verily Allah is free of all wants, Worthy of all praise.
tafsir: Had We intended We could have given every soul its guidance; but inevitable is My word that I will fill up Hell with men and jinns together.

arabic: وإذ قال لقمان لابنه وهو يعظه يا بني لا تشرك بالله ۖ إن الشرك لظلم عظيم
english: Behold, Luqman said to his son by way of instruction: "O my son! join not in worship (others) with Allah: for false worship is indeed the highest wrong-doing."
tafsir: So now suffer. As you forgot the meeting of this your Day of Doom, so have We forgotten you. Now taste the everlasting punishment for your deeds.

arabic: ووصينا الإنسان بوالديه حملته أمه وهنا على وهن وفصاله في عامين أن اشكر لي ولوالديك إلي المصير
english: And We have enjoined on man (to be good) to his parents: in travail upon travail did his mother bear him, and in years twain was his weaning: (hear the command), "Show gratitude to Me and to thy parents: to Me is (thy final) Goal.
tafsir: Only they believe in Our revelations who, when they are reminded, bow in adoration, and give praise to their Lord, and do not become arrogant.

arabic: وإن جاهداك على أن تشرك بي ما ليس لك به علم فلا تطعهما ۖ وصاحبهما في الدنيا معروفا ۖ واتبع سبيل من أناب إلي ۚ ثم إلي مرجعكم فأنبئكم بما كنتم تعملون
english: "But if they strive to make thee join in worship with Me things of which thou hast no knowledge, obey them not; yet bear them company in this life with justice (and consideration), and follow the way of those who turn to me (in love): in the end the return of you all is to Me, and I will tell you the truth (and meaning) of all that ye did."
tafsir: Their backs do not rest on their beds, and they pray to their Lord in fear and hope, and spend of what We have given them (in charity).

arabic: يا بني إنها إن تك مثقال حبة من خردل فتكن في صخرة أو في السماوات أو في الأرض يأت بها الله ۚ إن الله لطيف خبير
english: "O my son!" (said Luqman), "If there be (but) the weight of a mustard-seed and it were (hidden) in a rock, or (anywhere) in the heavens or on earth, Allah will bring it forth: for Allah understands the finest mysteries, (and) is well-acquainted (with them).
tafsir: No soul knows what peace and joy lie hidden from them as reward for what they have done.

arabic: يا بني أقم الصلاة وأمر بالمعروف وانه عن المنكر واصبر على ما أصابك ۖ إن ذلك من عزم الأمور
english: "O my son! establish regular prayer, enjoin what is just, and forbid what is wrong: and bear with patient constancy whatever betide thee; for this is firmness (of purpose) in (the conduct of) affairs.
tafsir: Is one who is a believer like one who is a transgressor? No, they are not alike.

arabic: ولا تصعر خدك للناس ولا تمش في الأرض مرحا ۖ إن الله لا يحب كل مختال فخور
english: "And swell not thy cheek (for pride) at men, nor walk in insolence through the earth; for Allah loveth not any arrogant boaster.
tafsir: As for those who believe and do the right, there are gardens for abode as welcome for what they had done.

arabic: واقصد في مشيك واغضض من صوتك ۚ إن أنكر الأصوات لصوت الحمير
english: "And be moderate in thy pace, and lower thy voice; for the harshest of sounds without doubt is the braying of the ass."
tafsir: As for those who disobey, their abode is Hell. Whensoever they wish to escape from it they would be dragged back into it, and told: "Taste the torment of the Fire which you used to call a lie."

arabic: ألم تروا أن الله سخر لكم ما في السماوات وما في الأرض وأسبغ عليكم نعمه ظاهرة وباطنة ۗ ومن الناس من يجادل في الله بغير علم ولا هدى ولا كتاب منير
english: Do ye not see that Allah has subjected to your (use) all things in the heavens and on earth, and has made his bounties flow to you in exceeding measure, (both) seen and unseen? Yet there are among men those who dispute about Allah, without knowledge and without guidance, and without a Book to enlighten them!
tafsir: But We shall make them taste the affliction of this world before the greater torment, so that they may retract.

arabic: وإذا قيل لهم اتبعوا ما أنزل الله قالوا بل نتبع ما وجدنا عليه آباءنا ۚ أولو كان الشيطان يدعوهم إلى عذاب السعير
english: When they are told to follow the (Revelation) that Allah has sent down, they say: "Nay, we shall follow the ways that we found our fathers (following). "What! even if it is Satan beckoning them to the Penalty of the (Blazing) Fire?
tafsir: Who is more wicked than he who is reminded of his Lord's revelations yet turns away from them; We will surely requite the sinners.

arabic: ومن يسلم وجهه إلى الله وهو محسن فقد استمسك بالعروة الوثقى ۗ وإلى الله عاقبة الأمور
english: Whoever submits his whole self to Allah, and is a doer of good, has grasped indeed the most trustworthy hand-hold: and with Allah rests the End and Decision of (all) affairs.
tafsir: Verily We gave Moses the Book; so be not in doubt about his having received it; and We made it a guidance for the children of Israel.

arabic: ومن كفر فلا يحزنك كفره ۚ إلينا مرجعهم فننبئهم بما عملوا ۚ إن الله عليم بذات الصدور
english: But if any reject Faith, let not his rejection grieve thee: to Us is their return, and We shall tell them the truth of their deeds: for Allah knows well all that is in (men's) hearts.
tafsir: When they persevered and firmly believed Our revelations We appointed learned men among them who guided them by Our command.

arabic: نمتعهم قليلا ثم نضطرهم إلى عذاب غليظ
english: We grant them their pleasure for a little while: in the end shall We drive them to a chastisement unrelenting.
tafsir: Surely your Lord will decide between them about what they were at variance, on the Day of Resurrection.

arabic: ولئن سألتهم من خلق السماوات والأرض ليقولن الله ۚ قل الحمد لله ۚ بل أكثرهم لا يعلمون
english: If thou ask them, who it is that created the heavens and the earth. They will certainly say, "Allah". Say: "Praise be to Allah!" But most of them understand not.
tafsir: Did they not find guidance in the many generations We had destroyed before them, over whose dwellings they (now) walk? There were indeed signs in this. Will they even then not listen?

arabic: لله ما في السماوات والأرض ۚ إن الله هو الغني الحميد
english: To Allah belong all things in heaven and earth: verily Allah is He (that is) free of all wants, worthy of all praise.
tafsir: Do they not see that We drive the rain towards a land that is dry, then grow grain from it which their cattle and they themselves eat? Will they not see even then?

arabic: ولو أنما في الأرض من شجرة أقلام والبحر يمده من بعده سبعة أبحر ما نفدت كلمات الله ۗ إن الله عزيز حكيم
english: And if all the trees on earth were pens and the ocean (were ink), with seven oceans behind it to add to its (supply), yet would not the words of Allah be exhausted (in the writing): for Allah is Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.
tafsir: Yet they say: "When will this decree come, if you speak the truth?"

arabic: ما خلقكم ولا بعثكم إلا كنفس واحدة ۗ إن الله سميع بصير
english: And your creation or your resurrection is in no wise but as an individual soul: for Allah is He Who hears and sees (all things).
tafsir: Say: "Of no use will be the acceptance of belief to unbelievers on the Day of Decision, nor will they be granted respite.

arabic: ألم تر أن الله يولج الليل في النهار ويولج النهار في الليل وسخر الشمس والقمر كل يجري إلى أجل مسمى وأن الله بما تعملون خبير
english: Seest thou not that Allah merges Night into Day and he merges Day into Night; that He has subjected the sun, and the moon (to his Law), each running its course for a term appointed; and that Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do?
tafsir: Therefore turn away from them and wait as they are waiting.

arabic: ذلك بأن الله هو الحق وأن ما يدعون من دونه الباطل وأن الله هو العلي الكبير
english: That is because Allah is the (only) Reality, and because whatever else they invoke besides Him is Falsehood; and because Allah,- He is the Most High, Most Great.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ألم تر أن الفلك تجري في البحر بنعمت الله ليريكم من آياته ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لكل صبار شكور
english: Seest thou not that the ships sail through the ocean by the Grace of Allah?- that He may show you of His Signs? Verily in this are Signs for all who constantly persevere and give thanks.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وإذا غشيهم موج كالظلل دعوا الله مخلصين له الدين فلما نجاهم إلى البر فمنهم مقتصد ۚ وما يجحد بآياتنا إلا كل ختار كفور
english: When a wave covers them like the canopy (of clouds), they call to Allah, offering Him sincere devotion. But when He has delivered them safely to land, there are among them those that halt between (right and wrong). But none reject Our Signs except only a perfidious ungrateful (wretch)!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: يا أيها الناس اتقوا ربكم واخشوا يوما لا يجزي والد عن ولده ولا مولود هو جاز عن والده شيئا ۚ إن وعد الله حق ۖ فلا تغرنكم الحياة الدنيا ولا يغرنكم بالله الغرور
english: O mankind! do your duty to your Lord, and fear (the coming of) a Day when no father can avail aught for his son, nor a son avail aught for his father. Verily, the promise of Allah is true: let not then this present life deceive you, nor let the chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: إن الله عنده علم الساعة وينزل الغيث ويعلم ما في الأرحام ۖ وما تدري نفس ماذا تكسب غدا ۖ وما تدري نفس بأي أرض تموت ۚ إن الله عليم خبير
english: Verily the knowledge of the Hour is with Allah (alone). It is He Who sends down rain, and He Who knows what is in the wombs. Nor does any one know what it is that he will earn on the morrow: Nor does any one know in what land he is to die. Verily with Allah is full knowledge and He is acquainted (with all things).
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الم
english: A. L. M.
tafsir: Follow what is revealed to you by your Lord. Verily God is all-knowing and all-wise.

arabic: تنزيل الكتاب لا ريب فيه من رب العالمين
english: (This is) the Revelation of the Book in which there is no doubt,- from the Lord of the Worlds.
tafsir: Trust in God. God is sufficient as guardian.

arabic: أم يقولون افتراه ۚ بل هو الحق من ربك لتنذر قوما ما أتاهم من نذير من قبلك لعلهم يهتدون
english: Or do they say, "He has forged it"? Nay, it is the Truth from thy Lord, that thou mayest admonish a people to whom no warner has come before thee: in order that they may receive guidance.
tafsir: God has not provided two hearts in the breast of a man, nor made your wives, whom you pronounce "mothers" (in order to divorce them), your real mothers, nor has He made your adopted sons your real sons. This is only what your lips pronounce. God says what is just, and shows the right way.

arabic: الله الذي خلق السماوات والأرض وما بينهما في ستة أيام ثم استوى على العرش ۖ ما لكم من دونه من ولي ولا شفيع ۚ أفلا تتذكرون
english: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth, and all between them, in six Days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): ye have none, besides Him, to protect or intercede (for you): will ye not then receive admonition?
tafsir: Call them by the names of their fathers. This is the right course in the sight of God. If you do not know their fathers, they are then your brothers in religion and your friends. It will not be a sin if you make a mistake, unless you do so intentionally; for God is forgiving and kind.

arabic: يدبر الأمر من السماء إلى الأرض ثم يعرج إليه في يوم كان مقداره ألف سنة مما تعدون
english: He rules (all) affairs from the heavens to the earth: in the end will (all affairs) go up to Him, on a Day, the space whereof will be (as) a thousand years of your reckoning.
tafsir: The Prophet is closer to the faithful than they are themselves; and his wives are as their mothers. Yet blood relations are closer to one another according to God's decree, more than (other) believers and the emigrants (who left their homes in the cause of God), but you should be kind to your friends. This is inscribed in the Book (of decrees).

arabic: ذلك عالم الغيب والشهادة العزيز الرحيم
english: Such is He, the Knower of all things, hidden and open, the Exalted (in power), the Merciful;-
tafsir: When We made the covenant with the prophets, and with you, as with Noah and Abraham, Moses and Jesus son of Mary, a binding covenant,

arabic: الذي أحسن كل شيء خلقه ۖ وبدأ خلق الإنسان من طين
english: He Who has made everything which He has created most good: He began the creation of man with (nothing more than) clay,
tafsir: (It was) so that God may ask the truthful of their sincerity. As for the infidels, He has prepared a painful punishment for them.

arabic: ثم جعل نسله من سلالة من ماء مهين
english: And made his progeny from a quintessence of the nature of a fluid despised:
tafsir: O you who believe, remember the favours of God to you when an army came against you and We sent a wind against them and forces that you did not see. But God sees all that you do.

arabic: ثم سواه ونفخ فيه من روحه ۖ وجعل لكم السمع والأبصار والأفئدة ۚ قليلا ما تشكرون
english: But He fashioned him in due proportion, and breathed into him something of His spirit. And He gave you (the faculties of) hearing and sight and feeling (and understanding): little thanks do ye give!
tafsir: When they came upon you from above and below you, when the eyes were stupefied with horror, and hearts jumped to the throats, and you made wild suppositions about God.

arabic: وقالوا أإذا ضللنا في الأرض أإنا لفي خلق جديد ۚ بل هم بلقاء ربهم كافرون
english: And they say: "What! when we lie, hidden and lost, in the earth, shall we indeed be in a Creation renewed? Nay, they deny the Meeting with their Lord.
tafsir: The faithful were sorely tried there and were shaken completely,

arabic: قل يتوفاكم ملك الموت الذي وكل بكم ثم إلى ربكم ترجعون
english: Say: "The Angel of Death, put in charge of you, will (duly) take your souls: then shall ye be brought back to your Lord."
tafsir: When the hypocrites and those who were filled with doubt, said: "The promise of God and His Apostle was nothing but deceit."

arabic: ولو ترى إذ المجرمون ناكسو رءوسهم عند ربهم ربنا أبصرنا وسمعنا فارجعنا نعمل صالحا إنا موقنون
english: If only thou couldst see when the guilty ones will bend low their heads before their Lord, (saying:) "Our Lord! We have seen and we have heard: Now then send us back (to the world): we will work righteousness: for we do indeed (now) believe."
tafsir: When a section of them said: "O people of Yathrib, there is no place for you here, turn back;" and a section of them asked leave of the Prophet, saying: "Our homes lie exposed," -- while they were not exposed. Their only intention was to run away.

arabic: ولو شئنا لآتينا كل نفس هداها ولكن حق القول مني لأملأن جهنم من الجنة والناس أجمعين
english: If We had so willed, We could certainly have brought every soul its true guidance: but the Word from Me will come true, "I will fill Hell with Jinns and men all together."
tafsir: If the (enemy) had entered the city from every side and asked them to rise in revolt, they would have done so, and not hesitated but a little;

arabic: فذوقوا بما نسيتم لقاء يومكم هذا إنا نسيناكم ۖ وذوقوا عذاب الخلد بما كنتم تعملون
english: "Taste ye then - for ye forgot the Meeting of this Day of yours, and We too will forget you - taste ye the Penalty of Eternity for your (evil) deeds!"
tafsir: Whereas earlier they had made a promise to God that they would never turn their backs; and a promise made to God is answerable.

arabic: إنما يؤمن بآياتنا الذين إذا ذكروا بها خروا سجدا وسبحوا بحمد ربهم وهم لا يستكبرون ۩
english: Only those believe in Our Signs, who, when they are recited to them, fall down in prostration, and celebrate the praises of their Lord, nor are they (ever) puffed up with pride.
tafsir: Say: "Of no gain will be your running away if you run from death or being killed, even then you will enjoy the good things of life but only for a while."

arabic: تتجافى جنوبهم عن المضاجع يدعون ربهم خوفا وطمعا ومما رزقناهم ينفقون
english: Their limbs do forsake their beds of sleep, the while they call on their Lord, in Fear and Hope: and they spend (in charity) out of the sustenance which We have bestowed on them.
tafsir: Say: "Who will save you from God if He decide to afflict you or show you His mercy?" They will never find a friend or helper apart from God.

arabic: فلا تعلم نفس ما أخفي لهم من قرة أعين جزاء بما كانوا يعملون
english: Now no person knows what delights of the eye are kept hidden (in reserve) for them - as a reward for their (good) deeds.
tafsir: Surely God knows who among you obstruct, and those who say to their brethren: "Come to us," and go to battle but seldom,

arabic: أفمن كان مؤمنا كمن كان فاسقا ۚ لا يستوون
english: Is then the man who believes no better than the man who is rebellious and wicked? Not equal are they.
tafsir: Being chary of helping you. But when danger appears you will find them looking at you with eyes turning like a man's in the swoon of death. Yet when the danger is past they lash you with sharp tongues, covetous of the best (of booty). Such as these have not come to belief. So God nullifies whatever they have done. This is how (the innate law of) God works inevitably.

arabic: أما الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات فلهم جنات المأوى نزلا بما كانوا يعملون
english: For those who believe and do righteous deeds are Gardens as hospitable homes, for their (good) deeds.
tafsir: They think the allied tribes have not withdrawn; and if the allied tribes had advanced they would have wished that they were rather with the Arabs of the desert asking news of you; and had they been among you they would have fought but just a little.

arabic: وأما الذين فسقوا فمأواهم النار ۖ كلما أرادوا أن يخرجوا منها أعيدوا فيها وقيل لهم ذوقوا عذاب النار الذي كنتم به تكذبون
english: As to those who are rebellious and wicked, their abode will be the Fire: every time they wish to get away therefrom, they will be forced thereinto, and it will be said to them: "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire, the which ye were wont to reject as false."
tafsir: You have indeed a noble paradigm in the Apostle of God for him who fears God and the Day of Resurrection, and remembers God frequently.

arabic: ولنذيقنهم من العذاب الأدنى دون العذاب الأكبر لعلهم يرجعون
english: And indeed We will make them taste of the Penalty of this (life) prior to the supreme Penalty, in order that they may (repent and) return.
tafsir: When the faithful saw (the armies of) the allied tribes, they said: "This is what God and His Apostle had promised us; and God and His Apostle say the truth;" and this enhanced their faith and obedience.

arabic: ومن أظلم ممن ذكر بآيات ربه ثم أعرض عنها ۚ إنا من المجرمين منتقمون
english: And who does more wrong than one to whom are recited the Signs of his Lord, and who then turns away therefrom? Verily from those who transgress We shall exact (due) Retribution.
tafsir: There are men among the faithful who have been true to the covenant they had made with God; and some of them fulfilled their vows (by dying in His cause), and some still wait (prepared for death), and stand firm,

arabic: ولقد آتينا موسى الكتاب فلا تكن في مرية من لقائه ۖ وجعلناه هدى لبني إسرائيل
english: We did indeed aforetime give the Book to Moses: be not then in doubt of its reaching (thee): and We made it a guide to the Children of Israel.
tafsir: That God may recompense the truthful for their truthfulness, and punish the hypocrites or relent towards them, as He will. God is surely forgiving and kind.

arabic: وجعلنا منهم أئمة يهدون بأمرنا لما صبروا ۖ وكانوا بآياتنا يوقنون
english: And We appointed, from among them, leaders, giving guidance under Our command, so long as they persevered with patience and continued to have faith in Our Signs.
tafsir: God drove the unbelievers back in their fury, and they gained no advantage. God was sufficient (to help) the believers in the battle. God is all-powerful and all-mighty.

arabic: إن ربك هو يفصل بينهم يوم القيامة فيما كانوا فيه يختلفون
english: Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, in the matters wherein they differ (among themselves)
tafsir: He made those of the people of the Book who had helped (the tribes) descend from their forts, and filled their hearts with dread, so that you killed some and made many captive;

arabic: أولم يهد لهم كم أهلكنا من قبلهم من القرون يمشون في مساكنهم ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات ۖ أفلا يسمعون
english: Does it not teach them a lesson, how many generations We destroyed before them, in whose dwellings they (now) go to and fro? Verily in that are Signs: Do they not then listen?
tafsir: And He made you inherit their lands and mansions and wealth, and a country you had not traversed before, for God has power over everything.

arabic: أولم يروا أنا نسوق الماء إلى الأرض الجرز فنخرج به زرعا تأكل منه أنعامهم وأنفسهم ۖ أفلا يبصرون
english: And do they not see that We do drive rain to parched soil (bare of herbage), and produce therewith crops, providing food for their cattle and themselves? Have they not the vision?
tafsir: O Prophet, say to your wives: "In case you desire the life and pomp of this world, come, I will provide you handsomely, and let you go with a grace.

arabic: ويقولون متى هذا الفتح إن كنتم صادقين
english: They say: "When will this decision be, if ye are telling the truth?"
tafsir: But if you desire God, His Apostle, and the joys of life to come, then God has verily set apart for those of you who are good, a great reward."

arabic: قل يوم الفتح لا ينفع الذين كفروا إيمانهم ولا هم ينظرون
english: Say: "On the Day of Decision, no profit will it be to Unbelievers if they (then) believe! nor will they be granted a respite."
tafsir: O wives of the Prophet, whosoever of you commits an act of clear shamelessness, her punishment will be doubled. This is how (the innate law of) God works inevitably.

arabic: فأعرض عنهم وانتظر إنهم منتظرون
english: So turn away from them, and wait: they too are waiting.
tafsir: But whoever of you is obedient to God and His Apostle, and does the right, will be given a two-fold reward by Us; and We have a rich provision in readiness for her.

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم يا أيها النبي اتق الله ولا تطع الكافرين والمنافقين ۗ إن الله كان عليما حكيما
english: O Prophet! Fear Allah, and hearken not to the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites: verily Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
tafsir: He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatsoever issues from it, whatsoever comes down from the sky, and whatsoever goes up to it. He is all-merciful, all-forgiving.

arabic: واتبع ما يوحى إليك من ربك ۚ إن الله كان بما تعملون خبيرا
english: But follow that which comes to thee by inspiration from thy Lord: for Allah is well acquainted with (all) that ye do.
tafsir: The unbelievers say: "There is no coming of the Hour for us." Say: "Why not? By my Lord, the knower of the unknown, it will certainly come for you. Not even an atom's weight in the heavens and the earth, or something smaller or greater than it, is hidden from Him, and which is not recorded in the all-too-manifest Book,

arabic: وتوكل على الله ۚ وكفى بالله وكيلا
english: And put thy trust in Allah, and enough is Allah as a disposer of affairs.
tafsir: In order that He may recompense those who have believed and done the right. For them will be forgiveness and worthy sustenance.

arabic: ما جعل الله لرجل من قلبين في جوفه ۚ وما جعل أزواجكم اللائي تظاهرون منهن أمهاتكم ۚ وما جعل أدعياءكم أبناءكم ۚ ذلكم قولكم بأفواهكم ۖ والله يقول الحق وهو يهدي السبيل
english: Allah has not made for any man two hearts in his (one) body: nor has He made your wives whom ye divorce by Zihar your mothers: nor has He made your adopted sons your sons. Such is (only) your (manner of) speech by your mouths. But Allah tells (you) the Truth, and He shows the (right) Way.
tafsir: As for those who try to subvert Our signs, there is a punishment of painful torment.

arabic: ادعوهم لآبائهم هو أقسط عند الله ۚ فإن لم تعلموا آباءهم فإخوانكم في الدين ومواليكم ۚ وليس عليكم جناح فيما أخطأتم به ولكن ما تعمدت قلوبكم ۚ وكان الله غفورا رحيما
english: Call them by (the names of) their fathers: that is juster in the sight of Allah. But if ye know not their father's (names, call them) your Brothers in faith, or your maulas. But there is no blame on you if ye make a mistake therein: (what counts is) the intention of your hearts: and Allah is Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
tafsir: Those who have been given knowledge realise what has been revealed by the Lord is the truth, and leads to the path of the mighty and praiseworthy (God).

arabic: النبي أولى بالمؤمنين من أنفسهم ۖ وأزواجه أمهاتهم ۗ وأولو الأرحام بعضهم أولى ببعض في كتاب الله من المؤمنين والمهاجرين إلا أن تفعلوا إلى أوليائكم معروفا ۚ كان ذلك في الكتاب مسطورا
english: The Prophet is closer to the Believers than their own selves, and his wives are their mothers. Blood-relations among each other have closer personal ties, in the Decree of Allah. Than (the Brotherhood of) Believers and Muhajirs: nevertheless do ye what is just to your closest friends: such is the writing in the Decree (of Allah).
tafsir: The disbelievers say: "Shall we tell you of a man who prophesies that when you are reduced to particles and vanished in the dust, you will become a new creation

arabic: وإذ أخذنا من النبيين ميثاقهم ومنك ومن نوح وإبراهيم وموسى وعيسى ابن مريم ۖ وأخذنا منهم ميثاقا غليظا
english: And remember We took from the prophets their covenant: As (We did) from thee: from Noah, Abraham, Moses, and Jesus the son of Mary: We took from them a solemn covenant:
tafsir: Has he fabricated a lie about God, or is he possessed?" Not so; but those who believe not in the Hereafter are themselves afflicted and far astray.

arabic: ليسأل الصادقين عن صدقهم ۚ وأعد للكافرين عذابا أليما
english: That (Allah) may question the (custodians) of Truth concerning the Truth they (were charged with): And He has prepared for the Unbelievers a grievous Penalty.
tafsir: Do they not see what is before them and what is behind them of the heavens and the earth? We could cleave the earth and sink them, if We pleased, or drop a fragment of the sky upon them. There is surely a sign in this for every penitent creature.

arabic: يا أيها الذين آمنوا اذكروا نعمة الله عليكم إذ جاءتكم جنود فأرسلنا عليهم ريحا وجنودا لم تروها ۚ وكان الله بما تعملون بصيرا
english: O ye who believe! Remember the Grace of Allah, (bestowed) on you, when there came down on you hosts (to overwhelm you): But We sent against them a hurricane and forces that ye saw not: but Allah sees (clearly) all that ye do.
tafsir: We favoured David with excellence, (and commanded): "O Jibal and Tair, glorify the greatness of God with him." And We made iron pliable for him.

arabic: إذ جاءوكم من فوقكم ومن أسفل منكم وإذ زاغت الأبصار وبلغت القلوب الحناجر وتظنون بالله الظنونا
