tafsir: He is God your Lord, creator of everything. There is no god but He. How then do you turn away (from Him)?

arabic: الله خالق كل شيء ۖ وهو على كل شيء وكيل
english: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Guardian and Disposer of all affairs.
tafsir: Only they are turned away thus who deny the signs of God.

arabic: له مقاليد السماوات والأرض ۗ والذين كفروا بآيات الله أولئك هم الخاسرون
english: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth: and those who reject the Signs of Allah,- it is they who will be in loss.
tafsir: It is God who made the earth a dwelling for you, and the sky a vaulted roof, who fashioned you and gave you excellent form and provided you with clean and wholesome things. He is God, your Lord. So blessed be God, the Lord of all the worlds.

arabic: قل أفغير الله تأمروني أعبد أيها الجاهلون
english: Say: "Is it some one other than Allah that ye order me to worship, O ye ignorant ones?"
tafsir: He is the living. There is no god but He. Therefore pray to Him with obedience all-exclusive. Praise be to God, the Lord of all the worlds.

arabic: ولقد أوحي إليك وإلى الذين من قبلك لئن أشركت ليحبطن عملك ولتكونن من الخاسرين
english: But it has already been revealed to thee,- as it was to those before thee,- "If thou wert to join (gods with Allah), truly fruitless will be thy work (in life), and thou wilt surely be in the ranks of those who lose (all spiritual good)".
tafsir: Say: "I am forbidden to worship those you call apart from God, since clear signs have come to me from my Lord, and I am commanded to submit to the Lord of all the worlds."

arabic: بل الله فاعبد وكن من الشاكرين
english: Nay, but worship Allah, and be of those who give thanks.
tafsir: It is He who created you from dust, then a drop of semen, then the embryo; afterwards He brings you forth as a child; then you attain the age of manhood, and then reach old age. But some of you die before you reach the appointed term that you may haply understand.

arabic: وما قدروا الله حق قدره والأرض جميعا قبضته يوم القيامة والسماوات مطويات بيمينه ۚ سبحانه وتعالى عما يشركون
english: No just estimate have they made of Allah, such as is due to Him: On the Day of Judgment the whole of the earth will be but His handful, and the heavens will be rolled up in His right hand: Glory to Him! High is He above the Partners they attribute to Him!
tafsir: It is He who gives you life and death. When He creates a thing, He has only to say: "Be," and it is.

arabic: ونفخ في الصور فصعق من في السماوات ومن في الأرض إلا من شاء الله ۖ ثم نفخ فيه أخرى فإذا هم قيام ينظرون
english: The Trumpet will (just) be sounded, when all that are in the heavens and on earth will swoon, except such as it will please Allah (to exempt). Then will a second one be sounded, when, behold, they will be standing and looking on!
tafsir: Have you not seen how those who dispute the signs of God are turned away?

arabic: وأشرقت الأرض بنور ربها ووضع الكتاب وجيء بالنبيين والشهداء وقضي بينهم بالحق وهم لا يظلمون
english: And the Earth will shine with the Glory of its Lord: the Record (of Deeds) will be placed (open); the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward and a just decision pronounced between them; and they will not be wronged (in the least).
tafsir: Those who deny the Book and what We have sent down with Our apostles, will soon come to know

arabic: ووفيت كل نفس ما عملت وهو أعلم بما يفعلون
english: And to every soul will be paid in full (the fruit) of its Deeds; and (Allah) knoweth best all that they do.
tafsir: When, with (iron) collars and chains around their necks, they will be dragged

arabic: وسيق الذين كفروا إلى جهنم زمرا ۖ حتى إذا جاءوها فتحت أبوابها وقال لهم خزنتها ألم يأتكم رسل منكم يتلون عليكم آيات ربكم وينذرونكم لقاء يومكم هذا ۚ قالوا بلى ولكن حقت كلمة العذاب على الكافرين
english: The Unbelievers will be led to Hell in crowd: until, when they arrive, there, its gates will be opened. And its keepers will say, "Did not messengers come to you from among yourselves, rehearsing to you the Signs of your Lord, and warning you of the Meeting of This Day of yours?" The answer will be: "True: but the Decree of Punishment has been proved true against the Unbelievers!"
tafsir: Through boiling water, and then burnt in the Fire.

arabic: قيل ادخلوا أبواب جهنم خالدين فيها ۖ فبئس مثوى المتكبرين
english: (To them) will be said: "Enter ye the gates of Hell, to dwell therein: and evil is (this) Abode of the Arrogant!"
tafsir: They will then be asked: "Where are they you took as partners

arabic: وسيق الذين اتقوا ربهم إلى الجنة زمرا ۖ حتى إذا جاءوها وفتحت أبوابها وقال لهم خزنتها سلام عليكم طبتم فادخلوها خالدين
english: And those who feared their Lord will be led to the Garden in crowds: until behold, they arrive there; its gates will be opened; and its keepers will say: "Peace be upon you! well have ye done! enter ye here, to dwell therein."
tafsir: Apart from God?" They will answer: "They have left us in the lurch and fled. In fact it was nothing that we prayed to before." That is how God sends the unbelievers astray.

arabic: وقالوا الحمد لله الذي صدقنا وعده وأورثنا الأرض نتبوأ من الجنة حيث نشاء ۖ فنعم أجر العاملين
english: They will say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has truly fulfilled His Promise to us, and has given us (this) land in heritage: We can dwell in the Garden as we will: how excellent a reward for those who work (righteousness)!"
tafsir: "This is so because you went about exulting wrongfully in the land," (will they be told), "and you were insolent.

arabic: وترى الملائكة حافين من حول العرش يسبحون بحمد ربهم ۖ وقضي بينهم بالحق وقيل الحمد لله رب العالمين
english: And thou wilt see the angels surrounding the Throne (Divine) on all sides, singing Glory and Praise to their Lord. The Decision between them (at Judgment) will be in (perfect) justice, and the cry (on all sides) will be, "Praise be to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds!"
tafsir: So enter the gates of Hell to abide in it for ever." How evil the abode of the arrogant!

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حم
english: Ha Mim
tafsir: A revelation from the most benevolent, ever-merciful,

arabic: تنزيل الكتاب من الله العزيز العليم
english: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, Exalted in Power, Full of Knowledge,-
tafsir: A Book whose verses have been distinguished and explained, a lucid discourse for people who understand,

arabic: غافر الذنب وقابل التوب شديد العقاب ذي الطول ۖ لا إله إلا هو ۖ إليه المصير
english: Who forgiveth sin, accepteth repentance, is strict in punishment, and hath a long reach (in all things). there is no god but He: to Him is the final goal.
tafsir: Announcing happy news and warnings. And yet most of them are averse and do not listen,

arabic: ما يجادل في آيات الله إلا الذين كفروا فلا يغررك تقلبهم في البلاد
english: None can dispute about the Signs of Allah but the Unbelievers. Let not, then, their strutting about through the land deceive thee!
tafsir: And say: "Our hearts are immured against what you call us to. There is a deafness in our ears, and a veil lies between us and you. So act (your way), we are acting (ours)."

arabic: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح والأحزاب من بعدهم ۖ وهمت كل أمة برسولهم ليأخذوه ۖ وجادلوا بالباطل ليدحضوا به الحق فأخذتهم ۖ فكيف كان عقاب
english: But (there were people) before them, who denied (the Signs),- the People of Noah, and the Confederates (of Evil) after them; and every People plotted against their prophet, to seize him, and disputed by means of vanities, therewith to condemn the Truth; but it was I that seized them! and how (terrible) was My Requital!
tafsir: Say: "I am a man like you, (but) it is revealed to me that your God is one God, so take the straight path to Him, and ask Him to forgive your sins. Woe to the idolaters

arabic: وكذلك حقت كلمت ربك على الذين كفروا أنهم أصحاب النار
english: Thus was the Decree of thy Lord proved true against the Unbelievers; that truly they are Companions of the Fire!
tafsir: Who do not give a due share of their wealth for the welfare of others, and do not believe in the Hereafter.

arabic: الذين يحملون العرش ومن حوله يسبحون بحمد ربهم ويؤمنون به ويستغفرون للذين آمنوا ربنا وسعت كل شيء رحمة وعلما فاغفر للذين تابوا واتبعوا سبيلك وقهم عذاب الجحيم
english: Those who sustain the Throne (of Allah) and those around it Sing Glory and Praise to their Lord; believe in Him; and implore Forgiveness for those who believe: "Our Lord! Thy Reach is over all things, in Mercy and Knowledge. Forgive, then, those who turn in Repentance, and follow Thy Path; and preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire!
tafsir: But those who believe and do the right, will have a continuing reward.

arabic: ربنا وأدخلهم جنات عدن التي وعدتهم ومن صلح من آبائهم وأزواجهم وذرياتهم ۚ إنك أنت العزيز الحكيم
english: "And grant, our Lord! that they enter the Gardens of Eternity, which Thou hast promised to them, and to the righteous among their fathers, their wives, and their posterity! For Thou art (He), the Exalted in Might, Full of Wisdom.
tafsir: Say: "Do you refuse to believe in Him who created the earth in two spans of time, and set up compeers to Him, the Lord of all the worlds?

arabic: وقهم السيئات ۚ ومن تق السيئات يومئذ فقد رحمته ۚ وذلك هو الفوز العظيم
english: "And preserve them from (all) ills; and any whom Thou dost preserve from ills that Day,- on them wilt Thou have bestowed Mercy indeed: and that will be truly (for them) the highest Achievement".
tafsir: He placed firm stabilisers rising above its surface, blessed it with plenty and growth, and ingrained the means of growing its food within it, sufficient for all seekers, in four spans.

arabic: إن الذين كفروا ينادون لمقت الله أكبر من مقتكم أنفسكم إذ تدعون إلى الإيمان فتكفرون
english: The Unbelievers will be addressed: "Greater was the aversion of Allah to you than (is) your aversion to yourselves, seeing that ye were called to the Faith and ye used to refuse."
tafsir: Then He turned to the heavens, and it was smoke. So He said to it and the earth: "Come with willing obedience or perforce." They said: "We come willingly."

arabic: قالوا ربنا أمتنا اثنتين وأحييتنا اثنتين فاعترفنا بذنوبنا فهل إلى خروج من سبيل
english: They will say: "Our Lord! twice hast Thou made us without life, and twice hast Thou given us Life! Now have we recognised our sins: Is there any way out (of this)?"
tafsir: Then He created several skies in two spans, and ingrained in each sky its function, decking the nearest heaven with lamps, and guarded it. This has been determined by the mighty and all-knowing.

arabic: ذلكم بأنه إذا دعي الله وحده كفرتم ۖ وإن يشرك به تؤمنوا ۚ فالحكم لله العلي الكبير
english: (The answer will be:) "This is because, when Allah was invoked as the Only (object of worship), ye did reject Faith, but when partners were joined to Him, ye believed! the Command is with Allah, Most High, Most Great!"
tafsir: If even then they turn away, tell them: "I forewarn you of a terrible punishment like the thunderbolt that fell upon the 'Ad and Thamud."

arabic: هو الذي يريكم آياته وينزل لكم من السماء رزقا ۚ وما يتذكر إلا من ينيب
english: He it is Who showeth you his Signs, and sendeth down sustenance for you from the sky: but only those receive admonition who turn (to Allah).
tafsir: Their apostles came to them one after the other (saying): "Do not worship any one but God." They said: "If our Lord had pleased He would have sent the angels down. We reject what is sent with you."

arabic: فادعوا الله مخلصين له الدين ولو كره الكافرون
english: Call ye, then, upon Allah with sincere devotion to Him, even though the Unbelievers may detest it.
tafsir: So those who were 'Ad turned insolent unjustly in the land, and said: "Who is stronger than us?" Did they not see that God who created them was greater far in power than they? Yet they refused to believe Our signs.

arabic: رفيع الدرجات ذو العرش يلقي الروح من أمره على من يشاء من عباده لينذر يوم التلاق
english: Raised high above ranks (or degrees), (He is) the Lord of the Throne (of Authority): by His Command doth He send the Spirit (of inspiration) to any of His servants he pleases, that it may warn (men) of the Day of Mutual Meeting,-
tafsir: So We let loose on them a violent wind for several days of distress to make them taste a most disgraceful punishment here in this world, and far more shameful will be the punishment in the Hereafter, and there will be no succour for them.

arabic: يوم هم بارزون ۖ لا يخفى على الله منهم شيء ۚ لمن الملك اليوم ۖ لله الواحد القهار
english: The Day whereon they will (all) come forth: not a single thing concerning them is hidden from Allah. Whose will be the dominion that Day?" That of Allah, the One the Irresistible!
tafsir: As for the (tribe of) Thamud, We tried to guide them, but they preferred blindness to guidance; then they were seized by the torment of a humiliating punishment as requital for their misdeeds;

arabic: اليوم تجزى كل نفس بما كسبت ۚ لا ظلم اليوم ۚ إن الله سريع الحساب
english: That Day will every soul be requited for what it earned; no injustice will there be that Day, for Allah is Swift in taking account.
tafsir: But We saved those who believed and took heed for themselves.

arabic: وأنذرهم يوم الآزفة إذ القلوب لدى الحناجر كاظمين ۚ ما للظالمين من حميم ولا شفيع يطاع
english: Warn them of the Day that is (ever) drawing near, when the hearts will (come) right up to the throats to choke (them); No intimate friend nor intercessor will the wrong-doers have, who could be listened to.
tafsir: The day the enemies of God will be gathered at the Fire and the records of their deeds will be distributed,

arabic: يعلم خائنة الأعين وما تخفي الصدور
english: (Allah) knows of (the tricks) that deceive with the eyes, and all that the hearts (of men) conceal.
tafsir: So that when they reach it their ears and eyes and persons will testify to what they did.

arabic: والله يقضي بالحق ۖ والذين يدعون من دونه لا يقضون بشيء ۗ إن الله هو السميع البصير
english: And Allah will judge with (justice and) Truth: but those whom (men) invoke besides Him, will not (be in a position) to judge at all. Verily it is Allah (alone) Who hears and sees (all things).
tafsir: And they will say to their bodies: "Why did you testify against us?" They will answer: "God, who gave all things power of articulation, made us speak. It is He who created you the first time, and to Him you will return.

arabic: أولم يسيروا في الأرض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين كانوا من قبلهم ۚ كانوا هم أشد منهم قوة وآثارا في الأرض فأخذهم الله بذنوبهم وما كان لهم من الله من واق
english: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them? They were even superior to them in strength, and in the traces (they have left) in the land: but Allah did call them to account for their sins, and none had they to defend them against Allah.
tafsir: You did not hide your (doings) so that your ears or eyes or persons should not testify against you. In fact you thought that God did not know the things you used to do.

arabic: ذلك بأنهم كانت تأتيهم رسلهم بالبينات فكفروا فأخذهم الله ۚ إنه قوي شديد العقاب
english: That was because there came to them their messengers with Clear (Signs), but they rejected them: So Allah called them to account: for He is Full of Strength, Strict in Punishment.
tafsir: It is this notion you had of your Lord that caused your ruin, and you are lost."

arabic: ولقد أرسلنا موسى بآياتنا وسلطان مبين
english: Of old We sent Moses, with Our Signs and an authority manifest,
tafsir: Even if they are patient, their abode is Hell; and if they beg for favour, none will favour them.

arabic: إلى فرعون وهامان وقارون فقالوا ساحر كذاب
english: To Pharaoh, Haman, and Qarun; but they called (him)" a sorcerer telling lies!"...
tafsir: We had assigned to them close companions who made their past and present look attractive to them; and the fate that had once befallen the communities of jinns and men before them was justified upon them. They were indeed bound to perish.

arabic: فلما جاءهم بالحق من عندنا قالوا اقتلوا أبناء الذين آمنوا معه واستحيوا نساءهم ۚ وما كيد الكافرين إلا في ضلال
english: Now, when he came to them in Truth, from Us, they said, "Slay the sons of those who believe with him, and keep alive their females," but the plots of Unbelievers (end) in nothing but errors (and delusions)!...
tafsir: The disbelievers say: "Do not listen to this Qur'an, and shout away (its reading); you may haply prevail."

arabic: وقال فرعون ذروني أقتل موسى وليدع ربه ۖ إني أخاف أن يبدل دينكم أو أن يظهر في الأرض الفساد
english: Said Pharaoh: "Leave me to slay Moses; and let him call on his Lord! What I fear is lest he should change your religion, or lest he should cause mischief to appear in the land!"
tafsir: We shall make the disbelievers taste the severest punishment, and retribute them for the worst that they had done.

arabic: وقال موسى إني عذت بربي وربكم من كل متكبر لا يؤمن بيوم الحساب
english: Moses said: "I have indeed called upon my Lord and your Lord (for protection) from every arrogant one who believes not in the Day of Account!"
tafsir: This is the requital for God's enemies: Hell, where they will have their lasting home, as punishment for denying Our revelations.

arabic: وقال رجل مؤمن من آل فرعون يكتم إيمانه أتقتلون رجلا أن يقول ربي الله وقد جاءكم بالبينات من ربكم ۖ وإن يك كاذبا فعليه كذبه ۖ وإن يك صادقا يصبكم بعض الذي يعدكم ۖ إن الله لا يهدي من هو مسرف كذاب
english: A believer, a man from among the people of Pharaoh, who had concealed his faith, said: "Will ye slay a man because he says, 'My Lord is Allah'?- when he has indeed come to you with Clear (Signs) from your Lord? and if he be a liar, on him is (the sin of) his lie: but, if he is telling the Truth, then will fall on you something of the (calamity) of which he warns you: Truly Allah guides not one who transgresses and lies!
tafsir: Those who disbelieve will say: "O Lord, show us those among the jinns and men who had led us astray that we may trample them underfoot and make them wholly abject."

arabic: يا قوم لكم الملك اليوم ظاهرين في الأرض فمن ينصرنا من بأس الله إن جاءنا ۚ قال فرعون ما أريكم إلا ما أرى وما أهديكم إلا سبيل الرشاد
english: "O my People! Yours is the dominion this day: Ye have the upper hand in the land: but who will help us from the Punishment of Allah, should it befall us?" Pharaoh said: "I but point out to you that which I see (myself); Nor do I guide you but to the Path of Right!"
tafsir: Surely the angels will come down to those who say, 'Our Lord is God' and then remain steadfast, saying: "You should have neither fear nor regret, but rejoice in the happy news of Paradise that has been promised you.

arabic: وقال الذي آمن يا قوم إني أخاف عليكم مثل يوم الأحزاب
english: Then said the man who believed: "O my people! Truly I do fear for you something like the Day (of disaster) of the Confederates (in sin)!-
tafsir: We are your friends in this life and in the Hereafter where you will get whatever your hearts desire, and have whatsoever you ask for,

arabic: مثل دأب قوم نوح وعاد وثمود والذين من بعدهم ۚ وما الله يريد ظلما للعباد
english: "Something like the fate of the People of Noah, the 'Ad, and the Thamud, and those who came after them: but Allah never wishes injustice to his Servants.
tafsir: As a gift from the forgiving, ever-merciful (God)."

arabic: ويا قوم إني أخاف عليكم يوم التناد
english: "And O my people! I fear for you a Day when there will be Mutual calling (and wailing),-
tafsir: Whose word is better than his who calls to God and does the right, and says: "I am of the obedient?"

arabic: يوم تولون مدبرين ما لكم من الله من عاصم ۗ ومن يضلل الله فما له من هاد
english: "A Day when ye shall turn your backs and flee: No defender shall ye have from Allah: Any whom Allah leaves to stray, there is none to guide...
tafsir: Good and evil are not alike. Repel evil with what is good. Then you will find your erstwhile enemy like a close. affectionate friend.

arabic: ولقد جاءكم يوسف من قبل بالبينات فما زلتم في شك مما جاءكم به ۖ حتى إذا هلك قلتم لن يبعث الله من بعده رسولا ۚ كذلك يضل الله من هو مسرف مرتاب
english: "And to you there came Joseph in times gone by, with Clear Signs, but ye ceased not to doubt of the (Mission) for which he had come: At length, when he died, ye said: 'No messenger will Allah send after him.' thus doth Allah leave to stray such as transgress and live in doubt,-
tafsir: Only they attain it who forbear, and only a man of great good fortune can achieve it.

arabic: الذين يجادلون في آيات الله بغير سلطان أتاهم ۖ كبر مقتا عند الله وعند الذين آمنوا ۚ كذلك يطبع الله على كل قلب متكبر جبار
english: "(Such) as dispute about the Signs of Allah, without any authority that hath reached them, grievous and odious (is such conduct) in the sight of Allah and of the Believers. Thus doth Allah, seal up every heart - of arrogant and obstinate Transgressors."
tafsir: If the Devil incite you to evil, seek refuge in God. He is all-hearing and all-knowing.

arabic: وقال فرعون يا هامان ابن لي صرحا لعلي أبلغ الأسباب
english: Pharaoh said: "O Haman! Build me a lofty palace, that I may attain the ways and means-
tafsir: The night and day and the sun and moon are (only) some of His signs. So do not bow before the sun and the moon, but bow in homage to God who created them, if you truly worship Him.

arabic: أسباب السماوات فأطلع إلى إله موسى وإني لأظنه كاذبا ۚ وكذلك زين لفرعون سوء عمله وصد عن السبيل ۚ وما كيد فرعون إلا في تباب
english: "The ways and means of (reaching) the heavens, and that I may mount up to the god of Moses: But as far as I am concerned, I think (Moses) is a liar!" Thus was made alluring, in Pharaoh's eyes, the evil of his deeds, and he was hindered from the Path; and the plot of Pharaoh led to nothing but perdition (for him).
tafsir: But if they become haughty (then remember) that those who are close to your Lord sing His praises night and day and do not grow weary of (doing so).

arabic: وقال الذي آمن يا قوم اتبعون أهدكم سبيل الرشاد
english: The man who believed said further: "O my people! Follow me: I will lead you to the Path of Right.
tafsir: It is among His signs that the earth you see all barren and desolate begins to stir and sprout when We send down rain upon it. Surely He who gives it life will also give life to the dead. Indeed He has power over everything.

arabic: يا قوم إنما هذه الحياة الدنيا متاع وإن الآخرة هي دار القرار
english: "O my people! This life of the present is nothing but (temporary) convenience: It is the Hereafter that is the Home that will last.
tafsir: Surely those who slander Our signs are not hidden from Us. Then, is he better who will be cast into Hell, or he who will come out safe on the Day of Resurrection? Do whatever you will, He sees whatsoever you do.

arabic: من عمل سيئة فلا يجزى إلا مثلها ۖ ومن عمل صالحا من ذكر أو أنثى وهو مؤمن فأولئك يدخلون الجنة يرزقون فيها بغير حساب
english: "He that works evil will not be requited but by the like thereof: and he that works a righteous deed - whether man or woman - and is a Believer- such will enter the Garden (of Bliss): Therein will they have abundance without measure.
tafsir: Those who reject the Reminder when it has come to them (should know) that it is a Book inviolate.

arabic: ويا قوم ما لي أدعوكم إلى النجاة وتدعونني إلى النار
english: "And O my people! How (strange) it is for me to call you to Salvation while ye call me to the Fire!
tafsir: Falsehood cannot enter it from any side: It's a revelation from the all-wise and praiseworthy (God).

arabic: تدعونني لأكفر بالله وأشرك به ما ليس لي به علم وأنا أدعوكم إلى العزيز الغفار
english: "Ye do call upon me to blaspheme against Allah, and to join with Him partners of whom I have no knowledge; and I call you to the Exalted in Power, Who forgives again and again!"
tafsir: Nothing is said to you which had not been said to other apostles before you. Surely your Lord is the lord of forgiveness, but also the lord of severe retribution.

arabic: لا جرم أنما تدعونني إليه ليس له دعوة في الدنيا ولا في الآخرة وأن مردنا إلى الله وأن المسرفين هم أصحاب النار
english: "Without doubt ye do call me to one who is not fit to be called to, whether in this world, or in the Hereafter; our return will be to Allah; and the Transgressors will be Companions of the Fire!
tafsir: If We had made it a discourse in an obscure tongue, they would have said: "Why were its revelations not expounded distinctly? A foreign tongue and an Arab (audience)?" Say: "For those who believe it is a guidance and a healing; but for those who do not believe it is a deafness in the ears, and a blindness. They are those one calls to from far away.

arabic: فستذكرون ما أقول لكم ۚ وأفوض أمري إلى الله ۚ إن الله بصير بالعباد
english: "Soon will ye remember what I say to you (now), My (own) affair I commit to Allah: for Allah (ever) watches over His Servants."
tafsir: Verily We gave Moses the Book; but they began to differ about it. If the Word of your Lord had not preceded it the matter would have been settled between them. They are still in doubt about it and uneasy.

arabic: فوقاه الله سيئات ما مكروا ۖ وحاق بآل فرعون سوء العذاب
english: Then Allah saved him from (every) ill that they plotted (against him), but the burnt of the Penalty encompassed on all sides the People of Pharaoh.
tafsir: Whoever does good does so for himself, and whoever does wrong bears the guilt thereof. Your Lord does no wrong to His creatures.

arabic: النار يعرضون عليها غدوا وعشيا ۖ ويوم تقوم الساعة أدخلوا آل فرعون أشد العذاب
english: In front of the Fire will they be brought, morning and evening: And (the sentence will be) on the Day that Judgment will be established: "Cast ye the People of Pharaoh into the severest Penalty!"
tafsir: He alone has knowledge of the Hour (of change): No fruit comes Out of its spathe, no female conceives or gives birth, but He has knowledge of it. The day He will call them (and ask): "Where are the compeers (you ascribed to Me)?" They will answer: "We profess to You not one of us can vouch for them."

arabic: وإذ يتحاجون في النار فيقول الضعفاء للذين استكبروا إنا كنا لكم تبعا فهل أنتم مغنون عنا نصيبا من النار
english: Behold, they will dispute with each other in the Fire! The weak ones (who followed) will say to those who had been arrogant, "We but followed you: Can ye then take (on yourselves) from us some share of the Fire?
tafsir: And those they used to worship will leave them in the lurch, and they will realise there is no escape for them.

arabic: قال الذين استكبروا إنا كل فيها إن الله قد حكم بين العباد
english: Those who had been arrogant will say: "We are all in this (Fire)! Truly, Allah has judged between (his) Servants!"
tafsir: Man never tires of praying for good; but if evil assails him he begins to despair.

arabic: وقال الذين في النار لخزنة جهنم ادعوا ربكم يخفف عنا يوما من العذاب
english: Those in the Fire will say to the Keepers of Hell: "Pray to your Lord to lighten us the Penalty for a day (at least)!"
tafsir: If We give him a taste of Our favour after some distress he has known, he says: "It was my due. I cannot imagine the Hour will come. And even if I go back to my Lord, there will surely still be the best for me with Him." We shall tell those who do not believe what they used to do, and inflict on them a heavy punishment.

arabic: قالوا أولم تك تأتيكم رسلكم بالبينات ۖ قالوا بلى ۚ قالوا فادعوا ۗ وما دعاء الكافرين إلا في ضلال
english: They will say: "Did there not come to you your messengers with Clear Signs?" They will say, "Yes". They will reply, "Then pray (as ye like)! But the prayer of those without Faith is nothing but (futile wandering) in (mazes of) error!"
tafsir: When We show Our favours to man he moves away and turns aside; but when in trouble he prays a great deal.

arabic: إنا لننصر رسلنا والذين آمنوا في الحياة الدنيا ويوم يقوم الأشهاد
english: We will, without doubt, help our messengers and those who believe, (both) in this world's life and on the Day when the Witnesses will stand forth,-
tafsir: Say: "Just think. If this is from God and you deny it, who will be in greater error than he who is in open dissent?"

arabic: يوم لا ينفع الظالمين معذرتهم ۖ ولهم اللعنة ولهم سوء الدار
english: The Day when no profit will it be to Wrong-doers to present their excuses, but they will (only) have the Curse and the Home of Misery.
tafsir: We will show Our signs to them in the horizons of the external world and within themselves, until it becomes clear to them that it's the truth. Is your Lord not sufficient? He is a witness over all things.

arabic: ولقد آتينا موسى الهدى وأورثنا بني إسرائيل الكتاب
english: We did aforetime give Moses the (Book of) Guidance, and We gave the book in inheritance to the Children of Israel,-
tafsir: In truth they are in doubt that they will ever face their Lord. Do they not know that He surrounds all things?

arabic: هدى وذكرى لأولي الألباب
english: A Guide and a Message to men of Understanding.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found
