arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حم
english: Ha Mim:
tafsir: 'Am Sin Qaf.

arabic: تنزيل من الرحمن الرحيم
english: A Revelation from (Allah), Most Gracious, Most Merciful;-
tafsir: So has God, all-mighty and all-wise, been revealing to you and to others before you.

arabic: كتاب فصلت آياته قرآنا عربيا لقوم يعلمون
english: A Book, whereof the verses are explained in detail;- a Qur'an in Arabic, for people who understand;-
tafsir: Whatever is in the heavens and the earth, belongs to Him. He is all-high and supreme.

arabic: بشيرا ونذيرا فأعرض أكثرهم فهم لا يسمعون
english: Giving good news and admonition: yet most of them turn away, and so they hear not.
tafsir: The skies are near to bursting asunder above them (for awe of Him), and the angels sing the praises of their Lord, imploring forgiveness for the dwellers of the earth. Is it not that God is forgiving and merciful?

arabic: وقالوا قلوبنا في أكنة مما تدعونا إليه وفي آذاننا وقر ومن بيننا وبينك حجاب فاعمل إننا عاملون
english: They say: "Our hearts are under veils, (concealed) from that to which thou dost invite us, and in our ears in a deafness, and between us and thee is a screen: so do thou (what thou wilt); for us, we shall do (what we will!)"
tafsir: Those who have taken protectors other than Him, are watched over by God. It is not for you to be their guardian.

arabic: قل إنما أنا بشر مثلكم يوحى إلي أنما إلهكم إله واحد فاستقيموا إليه واستغفروه ۗ وويل للمشركين
english: Say thou: "I am but a man like you: It is revealed to me by Inspiration, that your Allah is one Allah: so stand true to Him, and ask for His Forgiveness." And woe to those who join gods with Allah,-
tafsir: We have, therefore, revealed to you the eloquent Qur'an that you may warn the people of the Metropolis, and those who live around it, of the Day of Gathering, of which there is no doubt, (when mankind would be assembled) some in Heaven, some in Hell.

arabic: الذين لا يؤتون الزكاة وهم بالآخرة هم كافرون
english: Those who practise not regular Charity, and who even deny the Hereafter.
tafsir: If God had pleased He would have made them one community of belief; but He admits whom He please to His grace; yet the sinners have neither friend nor helper.

arabic: إن الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم أجر غير ممنون
english: For those who believe and work deeds of righteousness is a reward that will never fail.
tafsir: Have they taken others beside Him as protectors? It is God who protects; it is He who gives life to the dead, for He has power over everything.

arabic: قل أئنكم لتكفرون بالذي خلق الأرض في يومين وتجعلون له أندادا ۚ ذلك رب العالمين
english: Say: Is it that ye deny Him Who created the earth in two Days? And do ye join equals with Him? He is the Lord of (all) the Worlds.
tafsir: In whatever matter you disagree the ultimate judgement rests with God. This is God, my Lord; in Him have I placed my trust, if to Him I turn.

arabic: وجعل فيها رواسي من فوقها وبارك فيها وقدر فيها أقواتها في أربعة أيام سواء للسائلين
english: He set on the (earth), mountains standing firm, high above it, and bestowed blessings on the earth, and measure therein all things to give them nourishment in due proportion, in four Days, in accordance with (the needs of) those who seek (Sustenance).
tafsir: Originator of the heavens and the earth, He has made your consorts from among you, and made pairs of cattle. He multiplies you in this way. There is no other like Him. He is all-hearing and all-seeing.

arabic: ثم استوى إلى السماء وهي دخان فقال لها وللأرض ائتيا طوعا أو كرها قالتا أتينا طائعين
english: Moreover He comprehended in His design the sky, and it had been (as) smoke: He said to it and to the earth: "Come ye together, willingly or unwillingly." They said: "We do come (together), in willing obedience."
tafsir: He holds the keys of the heavens and the earth. He increases or decreases the provision of any one He will. He has knowledge of everything.

arabic: فقضاهن سبع سماوات في يومين وأوحى في كل سماء أمرها ۚ وزينا السماء الدنيا بمصابيح وحفظا ۚ ذلك تقدير العزيز العليم
english: So He completed them as seven firmaments in two Days, and He assigned to each heaven its duty and command. And We adorned the lower heaven with lights, and (provided it) with guard. Such is the Decree of (Him) the Exalted in Might, Full of Knowledge.
tafsir: He has laid down for you the (same) way of life and belief which He had commended to Noah, and which We have enjoined on you, and which We had bequeathed to Abraham, Moses and Jesus, so that they should maintain the order and not be divided among themselves. Heavy is to idolaters what you invite them to. God chooses whom He please for Himself, and guides to Himself whoever turns to Him.

arabic: فإن أعرضوا فقل أنذرتكم صاعقة مثل صاعقة عاد وثمود
english: But if they turn away, say thou: "I have warned you of a stunning Punishment (as of thunder and lightning) like that which (overtook) the 'Ad and the Thamud!"
tafsir: Yet they did not differ about it until knowledge came to them, through rivalries among themselves. If the Word of your Lord, (staying) it for a time ordained, had not preceded it, the matter would have been settled among them. But those who came to inherit the Book after them are also in doubt and disturbed about it.

arabic: إذ جاءتهم الرسل من بين أيديهم ومن خلفهم ألا تعبدوا إلا الله ۖ قالوا لو شاء ربنا لأنزل ملائكة فإنا بما أرسلتم به كافرون
english: Behold, the messengers came to them, from before them and behind them, (preaching): "Serve none but Allah." They said, "If our Lord had so pleased, He would certainly have sent down angels (to preach). Now we reject your mission (altogether)."
tafsir: Yet to that (law) you should call them, and be constant as commanded. Do not follow their passing whims, but say: "I believe in whatever Scripture God has revealed, and I am commanded to act with equivalence among you. God is our Lord and your Lord. To us our actions, to you your deeds. There is no dispute between you and us. God will gather us all together, and to Him is our returning."

arabic: فأما عاد فاستكبروا في الأرض بغير الحق وقالوا من أشد منا قوة ۖ أولم يروا أن الله الذي خلقهم هو أشد منهم قوة ۖ وكانوا بآياتنا يجحدون
english: Now the 'Ad behaved arrogantly through the land, against (all) truth and reason, and said: "Who is superior to us in strength?" What! did they not see that Allah, Who created them, was superior to them in strength? But they continued to reject Our Signs!
tafsir: As for those who argue in the matter of God after He has been fully acknowledged, their disputing has no force with their Lord. Upon them is (God's) anger, and the punishment for them will be severe.

arabic: فأرسلنا عليهم ريحا صرصرا في أيام نحسات لنذيقهم عذاب الخزي في الحياة الدنيا ۖ ولعذاب الآخرة أخزى ۖ وهم لا ينصرون
english: So We sent against them a furious Wind through days of disaster, that We might give them a taste of a Penalty of humiliation in this life; but the Penalty of a Hereafter will be more humiliating still: and they will find no help.
tafsir: It is God who has sent down the Book with the truth, and the Balance. How do you know the Hour is not near?

arabic: وأما ثمود فهديناهم فاستحبوا العمى على الهدى فأخذتهم صاعقة العذاب الهون بما كانوا يكسبون
english: As to the Thamud, We gave them Guidance, but they preferred blindness (of heart) to Guidance: so the stunning Punishment of humiliation seized them, because of what they had earned.
tafsir: Only they who do not believe in it wish to hasten it; but those who believe are in fear of it, for they know it to be true. Surely those who are in doubt about the Hour are wandering far astray.

arabic: ونجينا الذين آمنوا وكانوا يتقون
english: But We delivered those who believed and practised righteousness.
tafsir: God is gracious to His creatures, and bestows favours on whosoever He will. He is all-powerful and all-mighty.

arabic: ويوم يحشر أعداء الله إلى النار فهم يوزعون
english: On the Day that the enemies of Allah will be gathered together to the Fire, they will be marched in ranks.
tafsir: Whoever desires the fruits of the Hereafter, We shall add to his fruit. As for him who desires the fruits of this world, We shall give to him of these, but he will have no share in the Hereafter.

arabic: حتى إذا ما جاءوها شهد عليهم سمعهم وأبصارهم وجلودهم بما كانوا يعملون
english: At length, when they reach the (Fire), their hearing, their sight, and their skins will bear witness against them, as to (all) their deeds.
tafsir: Have they other associates who have prescribed another law for them which has not been dispensed by God? But for the decisive Word (of God) a sentence would have been passed amongst them. Surely there is a grievous punishment for the ungodly.

arabic: وقالوا لجلودهم لم شهدتم علينا ۖ قالوا أنطقنا الله الذي أنطق كل شيء وهو خلقكم أول مرة وإليه ترجعون
english: They will say to their skins: "Why bear ye witness against us?" They will say: "Allah hath given us speech,- (He) Who giveth speech to everything: He created you for the first time, and unto Him were ye to return.
tafsir: You will see the evil-doers full of fear of what they deserve, yet it will come to pass. But those who believe and do the right will be in gardens of Paradise. They will receive what they wish from their Lord; and this will be the greatest favour.

arabic: وما كنتم تستترون أن يشهد عليكم سمعكم ولا أبصاركم ولا جلودكم ولكن ظننتم أن الله لا يعلم كثيرا مما تعملون
english: "Ye did not seek to hide yourselves, lest your hearing, your sight, and your skins should bear witness against you! But ye did think that Allah knew not many of the things that ye used to do!
tafsir: This is the good news that God gives to His creatures who believe and do good. Say: "I ask no recompense of you for it other than obligations of relationship." We shall give more excellence to him who acquires excellence. Surely God forgives and accepts (gratitude).

arabic: وذلكم ظنكم الذي ظننتم بربكم أرداكم فأصبحتم من الخاسرين
english: "But this thought of yours which ye did entertain concerning your Lord, hath brought you to destruction, and (now) have ye become of those utterly lost!"
tafsir: Do they say he has fabricated a lie about God? He could have sealed your hearts if He pleased; but God blots out the false and vindicates the truth by His dispensations, for He knows the secrets of the hearts.

arabic: فإن يصبروا فالنار مثوى لهم ۖ وإن يستعتبوا فما هم من المعتبين
english: If, then, they have patience, the Fire will be a home for them! and if they beg to be received into favour, into favour will they not (then) be received.
tafsir: It is He who accepts repentance from His creatures and forgives their trespasses, for He knows what you do.

arabic: وقيضنا لهم قرناء فزينوا لهم ما بين أيديهم وما خلفهم وحق عليهم القول في أمم قد خلت من قبلهم من الجن والإنس ۖ إنهم كانوا خاسرين
english: And We have destined for them intimate companions (of like nature), who made alluring to them what was before them and behind them; and the sentence among the previous generations of Jinns and men, who have passed away, is proved against them; for they are utterly lost.
tafsir: He answers (the prayers) of those who believe and do good, and gives them more of His bounty. But for the unbelievers there is severe punishment.

arabic: وقال الذين كفروا لا تسمعوا لهذا القرآن والغوا فيه لعلكم تغلبون
english: The Unbelievers say: "Listen not to this Qur'an, but talk at random in the midst of its (reading), that ye may gain the upper hand!"
tafsir: If God were to give in abundance to His creatures they would fill the earth with oppression. So He gives according to measure as He will. He knows (what is good for) His creatures. He is all-aware and all-seeing.

arabic: فلنذيقن الذين كفروا عذابا شديدا ولنجزينهم أسوأ الذي كانوا يعملون
english: But We will certainly give the Unbelievers a taste of a severe Penalty, and We will requite them for the worst of their deeds.
tafsir: It is He who sends down rain when they had despaired of it, and showers His benevolence. He is the protector worthy of praise.

arabic: ذلك جزاء أعداء الله النار ۖ لهم فيها دار الخلد ۖ جزاء بما كانوا بآياتنا يجحدون
english: Such is the requital of the enemies of Allah,- the Fire: therein will be for them the Eternal Home: a (fit) requital, for that they were wont to reject Our Signs.
tafsir: The creation of the heavens and the earth and all the living things dispersed in them, are a sign of His. He has the power to gather them together when He will.

arabic: وقال الذين كفروا ربنا أرنا اللذين أضلانا من الجن والإنس نجعلهما تحت أقدامنا ليكونا من الأسفلين
english: And the Unbelievers will say: "Our Lord! Show us those, among Jinns and men, who misled us: We shall crush them beneath our feet, so that they become the vilest (before all)."
tafsir: Whatever misfortune befalls you is a consequence of your deeds; yet He forgives much.

arabic: إن الذين قالوا ربنا الله ثم استقاموا تتنزل عليهم الملائكة ألا تخافوا ولا تحزنوا وأبشروا بالجنة التي كنتم توعدون
english: In the case of those who say, "Our Lord is Allah", and, further, stand straight and steadfast, the angels descend on them (from time to time): "Fear ye not!" (they suggest), "Nor grieve! but receive the Glad Tidings of the Garden (of Bliss), the which ye were promised!
tafsir: You cannot thwart Him on the earth, and have no friend or helper apart from Him.

arabic: نحن أولياؤكم في الحياة الدنيا وفي الآخرة ۖ ولكم فيها ما تشتهي أنفسكم ولكم فيها ما تدعون
english: "We are your protectors in this life and in the Hereafter: therein shall ye have all that your souls shall desire; therein shall ye have all that ye ask for!-
tafsir: Ships sailing in the ocean like ensigns are a sign of His.

arabic: نزلا من غفور رحيم
english: "A hospitable gift from one Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful!"
tafsir: He could stop the wind if He pleased, then they would be stranded on its surface. Surely there are signs in this for every one who perseveres and is grateful.

arabic: ومن أحسن قولا ممن دعا إلى الله وعمل صالحا وقال إنني من المسلمين
english: Who is better in speech than one who calls (men) to Allah, works righteousness, and says, "I am of those who bow in Islam"?
tafsir: Or He could wreck them for what they have done; yet there is much that He pardons.

arabic: ولا تستوي الحسنة ولا السيئة ۚ ادفع بالتي هي أحسن فإذا الذي بينك وبينه عداوة كأنه ولي حميم
english: Nor can goodness and Evil be equal. Repel (Evil) with what is better: Then will he between whom and thee was hatred become as it were thy friend and intimate!
tafsir: Let those who dispute Our signs know that there is no way of escape for them.

arabic: وما يلقاها إلا الذين صبروا وما يلقاها إلا ذو حظ عظيم
english: And no one will be granted such goodness except those who exercise patience and self-restraint,- none but persons of the greatest good fortune.
tafsir: Whatsoever you have been given is only this life's merchandise; but what is with God is better and more lasting for those who believe and place their trust in their Lord,

arabic: وإما ينزغنك من الشيطان نزغ فاستعذ بالله ۖ إنه هو السميع العليم
english: And if (at any time) an incitement to discord is made to thee by the Evil One, seek refuge in Allah. He is the One Who hears and knows all things.
tafsir: Who avoid the deadly sins, immoral acts, and forgive when they are angered,

arabic: ومن آياته الليل والنهار والشمس والقمر ۚ لا تسجدوا للشمس ولا للقمر واسجدوا لله الذي خلقهن إن كنتم إياه تعبدون
english: Among His Signs are the Night and the Day, and the Sun and the Moon. Do not prostrate to the sun and the moon, but prostrate to Allah, Who created them, if it is Him ye wish to serve.
tafsir: Who obey the commands of their Lord and fulfil their devotional obligations, whose affairs are settled by mutual consultation, who spend of what We have given them,

arabic: فإن استكبروا فالذين عند ربك يسبحون له بالليل والنهار وهم لا يسأمون ۩
english: But is the (Unbelievers) are arrogant, (no matter): for in the presence of thy Lord are those who celebrate His praises by night and by day. And they never flag (nor feel themselves above it).
tafsir: And those who defend themselves when they are wronged.

arabic: ومن آياته أنك ترى الأرض خاشعة فإذا أنزلنا عليها الماء اهتزت وربت ۚ إن الذي أحياها لمحيي الموتى ۚ إنه على كل شيء قدير
english: And among His Signs in this: thou seest the earth barren and desolate; but when We send down rain to it, it is stirred to life and yields increase. Truly, He Who gives life to the (dead) earth can surely give life to (men) who are dead. For He has power over all things.
tafsir: The retribution of evil is the equal of evil (done); yet those who forgive and rehabilitate will be rewarded by God. Verily He does not like those who do wrong.

arabic: إن الذين يلحدون في آياتنا لا يخفون علينا ۗ أفمن يلقى في النار خير أم من يأتي آمنا يوم القيامة ۚ اعملوا ما شئتم ۖ إنه بما تعملون بصير
english: Those who pervert the Truth in Our Signs are not hidden from Us. Which is better?- he that is cast into the Fire, or he that comes safe through, on the Day of Judgment? Do what ye will: verily He seeth (clearly) all that ye do.
tafsir: If one avenges himself after he has been wronged, there is no way of blaming him.

arabic: إن الذين كفروا بالذكر لما جاءهم ۖ وإنه لكتاب عزيز
english: Those who reject the Message when it comes to them (are not hidden from Us). And indeed it is a Book of exalted power.
tafsir: Blame lies on those who oppress, and terrorise the land unjustly. For them there is painful punishment.

arabic: لا يأتيه الباطل من بين يديه ولا من خلفه ۖ تنزيل من حكيم حميد
english: No falsehood can approach it from before or behind it: It is sent down by One Full of Wisdom, Worthy of all Praise.
tafsir: But he who bears with patience and forgives, surely complies with divine resolve.

arabic: ما يقال لك إلا ما قد قيل للرسل من قبلك ۚ إن ربك لذو مغفرة وذو عقاب أليم
english: Nothing is said to thee that was not said to the messengers before thee: that thy lord has at his Command (all) forgiveness as well as a most Grievous Penalty.
tafsir: He whom God leads astray has no one except God to protect him. You should see the sinners when they face the punishment. They will say: "Isn't there a way of going back?"

arabic: ولو جعلناه قرآنا أعجميا لقالوا لولا فصلت آياته ۖ أأعجمي وعربي ۗ قل هو للذين آمنوا هدى وشفاء ۖ والذين لا يؤمنون في آذانهم وقر وهو عليهم عمى ۚ أولئك ينادون من مكان بعيد
english: Had We sent this as a Qur'an (in the language) other than Arabic, they would have said: "Why are not its verses explained in detail? What! (a Book) not in Arabic and (a Messenger an Arab?" Say: "It is a Guide and a Healing to those who believe; and for those who believe not, there is a deafness in their ears, and it is blindness in their (eyes): They are (as it were) being called from a place far distant!"
tafsir: You should see them brought before the Fire, abject in disgrace, looking stealthily. And those who believe will say: "They who forfeit their souls and families on the Day of Resurrection will really be losers." Is it not that sinners will suffer a lasting torment?

arabic: ولقد آتينا موسى الكتاب فاختلف فيه ۗ ولولا كلمة سبقت من ربك لقضي بينهم ۚ وإنهم لفي شك منه مريب
english: We certainly gave Moses the Book aforetime: but disputes arose therein. Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord, (their differences) would have been settled between them: but they remained in suspicious disquieting doubt thereon.
tafsir: They will have no protector to help them other than God. He whom God allows to go astray has no way.

arabic: من عمل صالحا فلنفسه ۖ ومن أساء فعليها ۗ وما ربك بظلام للعبيد
english: Whoever works righteousness benefits his own soul; whoever works evil, it is against his own soul: nor is thy Lord ever unjust (in the least) to His Servants.
tafsir: Hearken to your Lord before the Day arrives from God that will not be averted. You will have no place of refuge then nor time for denying.

arabic: إليه يرد علم الساعة ۚ وما تخرج من ثمرات من أكمامها وما تحمل من أنثى ولا تضع إلا بعلمه ۚ ويوم يناديهم أين شركائي قالوا آذناك ما منا من شهيد
english: To Him is referred the Knowledge of the Hour (of Judgment: He knows all): No date-fruit comes out of its sheath, nor does a female conceive (within her womb) nor bring forth the Day that (Allah) will propound to them the (question), "Where are the partners (ye attributed to Me?" They will say, "We do assure thee not one of us can bear witness!"
tafsir: If they turn away (you are not responsible); We have not appointed you a warden over them. Your duty is to deliver the message. When We let man taste of Our favours he begins to exult; but if misfortune befalls him, as a consequence of his own deeds, man is surely then ungrateful.

arabic: وضل عنهم ما كانوا يدعون من قبل ۖ وظنوا ما لهم من محيص
english: The (deities) they used to invoke aforetime will leave them in the lurch, and they will perceive that they have no way of escape.
tafsir: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He creates whatsoever He wills, bestows daughters on whosoever He will, and gives sons to whom He choose.

arabic: لا يسأم الإنسان من دعاء الخير وإن مسه الشر فيئوس قنوط
english: Man does not weary of asking for good (things), but if ill touches him, he gives up all hope (and) is lost in despair.
tafsir: On some He bestows both sons and daughters, and some He leaves issueless. He is all-knowing and all-powerful.

arabic: ولئن أذقناه رحمة منا من بعد ضراء مسته ليقولن هذا لي وما أظن الساعة قائمة ولئن رجعت إلى ربي إن لي عنده للحسنى ۚ فلننبئن الذين كفروا بما عملوا ولنذيقنهم من عذاب غليظ
english: When we give him a taste of some Mercy from Ourselves, after some adversity has touched him, he is sure to say, "This is due to my (merit): I think not that the Hour (of Judgment) will (ever) be established; but if I am brought back to my Lord, I have (much) good (stored) in His sight!" But We will show the Unbelievers the truth of all that they did, and We shall give them the taste of a severe Penalty.
tafsir: It is not given to man that God should speak to him except by suggestion or indirectly, or send a messenger to convey by His command whatsoever He please. He is all-high and all-wise.

arabic: وإذا أنعمنا على الإنسان أعرض ونأى بجانبه وإذا مسه الشر فذو دعاء عريض
english: When We bestow favours on man, he turns away, and gets himself remote on his side (instead of coming to Us); and when evil seizes him, (he comes) full of prolonged prayer!
tafsir: So have We revealed to you the Qur'an by Our command. You did not know what the Scripture was before, nor (the laws of) faith. And We made it a light by which We show the way to those of Our creatures as We please; and you certainly guide them to the right path,

arabic: قل أرأيتم إن كان من عند الله ثم كفرتم به من أضل ممن هو في شقاق بعيد
english: Say: "See ye if the (Revelation) is (really) from Allah, and yet do ye reject it? Who is more astray than one who is in a schism far (from any purpose)?"
tafsir: The path of God to whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And will not all things go back to God?

arabic: سنريهم آياتنا في الآفاق وفي أنفسهم حتى يتبين لهم أنه الحق ۗ أولم يكف بربك أنه على كل شيء شهيد
english: Soon will We show them our Signs in the (furthest) regions (of the earth), and in their own souls, until it becomes manifest to them that this is the Truth. Is it not enough that thy Lord doth witness all things?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ألا إنهم في مرية من لقاء ربهم ۗ ألا إنه بكل شيء محيط
english: Ah indeed! Are they in doubt concerning the Meeting with their Lord? Ah indeed! It is He that doth encompass all things!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حم
english: Ha-Mim
tafsir: I call to witness the lucent Book,

arabic: عسق
english: 'Ain. Sin. Qaf.
tafsir: That We made it a distinctly lucid Qur'an that you may understand.

arabic: كذلك يوحي إليك وإلى الذين من قبلك الله العزيز الحكيم
english: Thus doth (He) send inspiration to thee as (He did) to those before thee,- Allah, Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.
tafsir: It is inscribed in the original Book (of Books) with Us, sublime, dispenser of (all) laws.

arabic: له ما في السماوات وما في الأرض ۖ وهو العلي العظيم
english: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth: and He is Most High, Most Great.
tafsir: Should We have withdrawn the Reminder from you as you are a people who exceed the bounds?

arabic: تكاد السماوات يتفطرن من فوقهن ۚ والملائكة يسبحون بحمد ربهم ويستغفرون لمن في الأرض ۗ ألا إن الله هو الغفور الرحيم
english: The heavens are almost rent asunder from above them (by Him Glory): and the angels celebrate the Praises of their Lord, and pray for forgiveness for (all) beings on earth: Behold! Verily Allah is He, the Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
tafsir: Many a prophet had We sent to the earlier communities,

arabic: والذين اتخذوا من دونه أولياء الله حفيظ عليهم وما أنت عليهم بوكيل
english: And those who take as protectors others besides Him,- Allah doth watch over them; and thou art not the disposer of their affairs.
tafsir: But never did a prophet come at whom they did not scoff.

arabic: وكذلك أوحينا إليك قرآنا عربيا لتنذر أم القرى ومن حولها وتنذر يوم الجمع لا ريب فيه ۚ فريق في الجنة وفريق في السعير
english: Thus have We sent by inspiration to thee an Arabic Qur'an: that thou mayest warn the Mother of Cities and all around her,- and warn (them) of the Day of Assembly, of which there is no doubt: (when) some will be in the Garden, and some in the Blazing Fire.
tafsir: So We destroyed far more powerful (nations) than they. The example of earlier people is there.

arabic: ولو شاء الله لجعلهم أمة واحدة ولكن يدخل من يشاء في رحمته ۚ والظالمون ما لهم من ولي ولا نصير
english: If Allah had so willed, He could have made them a single people; but He admits whom He will to His Mercy; and the Wrong-doers will have no protector nor helper.
tafsir: If you ask them: "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they will answer: "The Mighty and All-knowing created them,"

arabic: أم اتخذوا من دونه أولياء ۖ فالله هو الولي وهو يحيي الموتى وهو على كل شيء قدير
english: What! Have they taken (for worship) protectors besides Him? But it is Allah,- He is the Protector, and it is He Who gives life to the dead: It is He Who has power over all things,
tafsir: He who made the earth a bed for you, and laid out tracks upon it so that you may find the way;

arabic: وما اختلفتم فيه من شيء فحكمه إلى الله ۚ ذلكم الله ربي عليه توكلت وإليه أنيب
english: Whatever it be wherein ye differ, the decision thereof is with Allah: such is Allah my Lord: In Him I trust, and to Him I turn.
tafsir: Who sent down water in due measure from the sky, then quickened a region that was dead -- So shall We bring you forth --

arabic: فاطر السماوات والأرض ۚ جعل لكم من أنفسكم أزواجا ومن الأنعام أزواجا ۖ يذرؤكم فيه ۚ ليس كمثله شيء ۖ وهو السميع البصير
english: (He is) the Creator of the heavens and the earth: He has made for you pairs from among yourselves, and pairs among cattle: by this means does He multiply you: there is nothing whatever like unto Him, and He is the One that hears and sees (all things).
tafsir: He who created pairs of everything, and fashioned for you boats and beasts on which you ride,

arabic: له مقاليد السماوات والأرض ۖ يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر ۚ إنه بكل شيء عليم
english: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth: He enlarges and restricts. The Sustenance to whom He will: for He knows full well all things.
tafsir: So that when you sit astride of them and think of the bounties of your Lord, you may say: "All glory to Him who subjugated these for us. We were incapable of doing so.

arabic: شرع لكم من الدين ما وصى به نوحا والذي أوحينا إليك وما وصينا به إبراهيم وموسى وعيسى ۖ أن أقيموا الدين ولا تتفرقوا فيه ۚ كبر على المشركين ما تدعوهم إليه ۚ الله يجتبي إليه من يشاء ويهدي إليه من ينيب
english: The same religion has He established for you as that which He enjoined on Noah - the which We have sent by inspiration to thee - and that which We enjoined on Abraham, Moses, and Jesus: Namely, that ye should remain steadfast in religion, and make no divisions therein: to those who worship other things than Allah, hard is the (way) to which thou callest them. Allah chooses to Himself those whom He pleases, and guides to Himself those who turn (to Him).
tafsir: Surely we have to go back to our Lord."

arabic: وما تفرقوا إلا من بعد ما جاءهم العلم بغيا بينهم ۚ ولولا كلمة سبقت من ربك إلى أجل مسمى لقضي بينهم ۚ وإن الذين أورثوا الكتاب من بعدهم لفي شك منه مريب
english: And they became divided only after Knowledge reached them,- through selfish envy as between themselves. Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord, (tending) to a Term appointed, the matter would have been settled between them: But truly those who have inherited the Book after them are in suspicious (disquieting) doubt concerning it.
tafsir: Yet they make some of His creatures His offspring! Man is surely most ungrateful.

arabic: فلذلك فادع ۖ واستقم كما أمرت ۖ ولا تتبع أهواءهم ۖ وقل آمنت بما أنزل الله من كتاب ۖ وأمرت لأعدل بينكم ۖ الله ربنا وربكم ۖ لنا أعمالنا ولكم أعمالكم ۖ لا حجة بيننا وبينكم ۖ الله يجمع بيننا ۖ وإليه المصير
english: Now then, for that (reason), call (them to the Faith), and stand steadfast as thou art commanded, nor follow thou their vain desires; but say: "I believe in the Book which Allah has sent down; and I am commanded to judge justly between you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord: for us (is the responsibility for) our deeds, and for you for your deeds. There is no contention between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is (our) Final Goal.
tafsir: Or has He taken from those He has created daughters for Himself, and assigned sons to you?

arabic: والذين يحاجون في الله من بعد ما استجيب له حجتهم داحضة عند ربهم وعليهم غضب ولهم عذاب شديد
english: But those who dispute concerning Allah after He has been accepted,- futile is their dispute in the Sight of their Lord: on them will be a Penalty terrible.
tafsir: Yet when news of (a daughter) they had reserved for Ar-Rahman comes to one of them, his face is blackened (with shame), and he grieves in silence inwardly.

arabic: الله الذي أنزل الكتاب بالحق والميزان ۗ وما يدريك لعل الساعة قريب
english: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book in Truth, and the Balance (by which to weigh conduct). And what will make thee realise that perhaps the Hour is close at hand?
tafsir: Can one who has been raised on ornaments and cannot present her case coolly in a dispute (be associated with God?)

arabic: يستعجل بها الذين لا يؤمنون بها ۖ والذين آمنوا مشفقون منها ويعلمون أنها الحق ۗ ألا إن الذين يمارون في الساعة لفي ضلال بعيد
english: Only those wish to hasten it who believe not in it: those who believe hold it in awe, and know that it is the Truth. Behold, verily those that dispute concerning the Hour are far astray.
tafsir: Yet they have made the angels, who are creatures of Ar-Rahman, females. Did they witness their creation? We shall record their testimony, and they will be interrogated.

arabic: الله لطيف بعباده يرزق من يشاء ۖ وهو القوي العزيز
english: Gracious is Allah to His servants: He gives Sustenance to whom He pleases: and He has power and can carry out His Will.
tafsir: Yet they say: "If Ar-Rahman had so pleased we would not have worshipped them." They have no knowledge of it in the least. They only make up lies.

arabic: من كان يريد حرث الآخرة نزد له في حرثه ۖ ومن كان يريد حرث الدنيا نؤته منها وما له في الآخرة من نصيب
english: To any that desires the tilth of the Hereafter, We give increase in his tilth, and to any that desires the tilth of this world, We grant somewhat thereof, but he has no share or lot in the Hereafter.
tafsir: Did We give them a Scripture before this to which they are holding fast?

arabic: أم لهم شركاء شرعوا لهم من الدين ما لم يأذن به الله ۚ ولولا كلمة الفصل لقضي بينهم ۗ وإن الظالمين لهم عذاب أليم
english: What! have they partners (in godhead), who have established for them some religion without the permission of Allah? Had it not been for the Decree of Judgment, the matter would have been decided between them (at once). But verily the Wrong-doers will have a grievous Penalty.
tafsir: In fact they say: "We found our fathers following a certain way, and are guided by their footprints."

arabic: ترى الظالمين مشفقين مما كسبوا وهو واقع بهم ۗ والذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات في روضات الجنات ۖ لهم ما يشاءون عند ربهم ۚ ذلك هو الفضل الكبير
english: Thou wilt see the Wrong-doers in fear on account of what they have earned, and (the burden of) that must (necessarily) fall on them. But those who believe and work righteous deeds will be in the luxuriant meads of the Gardens: they shall have, before their Lord, all that they wish for. That will indeed be the magnificent Bounty (of Allah).
tafsir: Thus, We never sent an admonisher to a settlement before you but the decadent among them said. "We found our fathers following this way, and we are walking in their footsteps."

arabic: ذلك الذي يبشر الله عباده الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات ۗ قل لا أسألكم عليه أجرا إلا المودة في القربى ۗ ومن يقترف حسنة نزد له فيها حسنا ۚ إن الله غفور شكور
english: That is (the Bounty) whereof Allah gives Glad Tidings to His Servants who believe and do righteous deeds. Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this except the love of those near of kin." And if any one earns any good, We shall give him an increase of good in respect thereof: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Ready to appreciate (service).
tafsir: "Even if I bring you a better guidance," he rejoined, "than the one you found your fathers on?" Still they said: "We do not believe in what you have brought."

arabic: أم يقولون افترى على الله كذبا ۖ فإن يشإ الله يختم على قلبك ۗ ويمح الله الباطل ويحق الحق بكلماته ۚ إنه عليم بذات الصدور
english: What! Do they say, "He has forged a falsehood against Allah"? But if Allah willed, He could seal up thy heart. And Allah blots out Vanity, and proves the Truth by His Words. For He knows well the secrets of all hearts.
tafsir: Then We punished them. So look at the fate of those who denied.

arabic: وهو الذي يقبل التوبة عن عباده ويعفو عن السيئات ويعلم ما تفعلون
english: He is the One that accepts repentance from His Servants and forgives sins: and He knows all that ye do.
tafsir: When Abraham said to his father and his people: "I am rid of what you worship

arabic: ويستجيب الذين آمنوا وعملوا الصالحات ويزيدهم من فضله ۚ والكافرون لهم عذاب شديد
english: And He listens to those who believe and do deeds of righteousness, and gives them increase of His Bounty: but for the Unbelievers their is a terrible Penalty.
tafsir: Other than Him who created me. He will show me the right way."

arabic: ولو بسط الله الرزق لعباده لبغوا في الأرض ولكن ينزل بقدر ما يشاء ۚ إنه بعباده خبير بصير
english: If Allah were to enlarge the provision for His Servants, they would indeed transgress beyond all bounds through the earth; but he sends (it) down in due measure as He pleases. For He is with His Servants Well-acquainted, Watchful.
tafsir: This is the legacy he left to his descendants so that they may turn (to God).

arabic: وهو الذي ينزل الغيث من بعد ما قنطوا وينشر رحمته ۚ وهو الولي الحميد
english: He is the One that sends down rain (even) after (men) have given up all hope, and scatters His Mercy (far and wide). And He is the Protector, Worthy of all Praise.
tafsir: In fact, I allowed them and their fathers to enjoy this life till the truth, and the apostle preaching it lucidly, came to them.

arabic: ومن آياته خلق السماوات والأرض وما بث فيهما من دابة ۚ وهو على جمعهم إذا يشاء قدير
english: And among His Signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the living creatures that He has scattered through them: and He has power to gather them together when He wills.
tafsir: Yet when the truth had come to them, they said: "This is sorcery. We shall never believe in it."

arabic: وما أصابكم من مصيبة فبما كسبت أيديكم ويعفو عن كثير
english: Whatever misfortune happens to you, is because on the things your hands have wrought, and for many (of them) He grants forgiveness.
tafsir: They also said: "Why was this Qur'an not sent down to some great man of the two cities?"

arabic: وما أنتم بمعجزين في الأرض ۖ وما لكم من دون الله من ولي ولا نصير
english: Nor can ye frustrate (aught), (fleeing) through the earth; nor have ye, besides Allah, any one to protect or to help.
tafsir: Are they the ones who dispense the favour of your Lord? It is He who apportions the means of livelihood among them in this world, and raises some in position over the others to make some others submissive. The favours of your Lord are better than what they amass.

arabic: ومن آياته الجوار في البحر كالأعلام
english: And among His Signs are the ships, smooth-running through the ocean, (tall) as mountains.
tafsir: Had it not been that all people would become one community (of unbelievers), We might have given those who disbelieve in Ar-Rahman roofs of silver for their dwellings and (silver) stairs for mounting,

arabic: إن يشأ يسكن الريح فيظللن رواكد على ظهره ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لكل صبار شكور
english: If it be His Will He can still the Wind: then would they become motionless on the back of the (ocean). Verily in this are Signs for everyone who patiently perseveres and is grateful.
tafsir: And doors (of silver) for their houses, (silver) couches for reclining,

arabic: أو يوبقهن بما كسبوا ويعف عن كثير
english: Or He can cause them to perish because of the (evil) which (the men) have earned; but much doth He forgive.
tafsir: And ornaments of gold. But all this would have been nothing but the vanity of this world. The Hereafter with your Lord is for those who take heed for themselves and follow the straight path.

arabic: ويعلم الذين يجادلون في آياتنا ما لهم من محيص
english: But let those know, who dispute about Our Signs, that there is for them no way of escape.
tafsir: We shall attach to him who goes blind to the remembrance of Ar-Rahman a devil as companion, --

arabic: فما أوتيتم من شيء فمتاع الحياة الدنيا ۖ وما عند الله خير وأبقى للذين آمنوا وعلى ربهم يتوكلون
english: Whatever ye are given (here) is (but) a convenience of this life: but that which is with Allah is better and more lasting: (it is) for those who believe and put their trust in their Lord:
tafsir: Surely the (devils) obstruct them from the path, though they think they are rightly guided, --

arabic: والذين يجتنبون كبائر الإثم والفواحش وإذا ما غضبوا هم يغفرون
english: Those who avoid the greater crimes and shameful deeds, and, when they are angry even then forgive;
tafsir: Until when he comes before Us he will say (to the devil): "Would to God there was a distance of the East and West between you and me, for you were an evil companion!"

arabic: والذين استجابوا لربهم وأقاموا الصلاة وأمرهم شورى بينهم ومما رزقناهم ينفقون
english: Those who hearken to their Lord, and establish regular Prayer; who (conduct) their affairs by mutual Consultation; who spend out of what We bestow on them for Sustenance;
tafsir: But nothing will avail you on that day, for you were unjust, and you will be partners in the punishment.

arabic: والذين إذا أصابهم البغي هم ينتصرون
english: And those who, when an oppressive wrong is inflicted on them, (are not cowed but) help and defend themselves.
tafsir: Can you make the deaf to hear, or show the blind, and those lost in clear error, the way?

arabic: وجزاء سيئة سيئة مثلها ۖ فمن عفا وأصلح فأجره على الله ۚ إنه لا يحب الظالمين
english: The recompense for an injury is an injury equal thereto (in degree): but if a person forgives and makes reconciliation, his reward is due from Allah: for (Allah) loveth not those who do wrong.
tafsir: We shall punish them whether We take you away,

arabic: ولمن انتصر بعد ظلمه فأولئك ما عليهم من سبيل
english: But indeed if any do help and defend themselves after a wrong (done) to them, against such there is no cause of blame.
tafsir: Or show you some of what We have promised them. They are certainly well within Our power.

arabic: إنما السبيل على الذين يظلمون الناس ويبغون في الأرض بغير الحق ۚ أولئك لهم عذاب أليم
english: The blame is only against those who oppress men and wrong-doing and insolently transgress beyond bounds through the land, defying right and justice: for such there will be a penalty grievous.
tafsir: So hold fast to what has been revealed to you. You are truly on the right path.

arabic: ولمن صبر وغفر إن ذلك لمن عزم الأمور
english: But indeed if any show patience and forgive, that would truly be an exercise of courageous will and resolution in the conduct of affairs.
tafsir: It is a (source) of greatness for you and your people. You will surely be questioned about it.

arabic: ومن يضلل الله فما له من ولي من بعده ۗ وترى الظالمين لما رأوا العذاب يقولون هل إلى مرد من سبيل
english: For any whom Allah leaves astray, there is no protector thereafter. And thou wilt see the Wrong-doers, when in sight of the Penalty, Say: "Is there any way (to effect) a return?"
tafsir: Inquire of apostles We had sent before you if We appointed gods to be worshipped other than Ar-Rahman.

arabic: وتراهم يعرضون عليها خاشعين من الذل ينظرون من طرف خفي ۗ وقال الذين آمنوا إن الخاسرين الذين خسروا أنفسهم وأهليهم يوم القيامة ۗ ألا إن الظالمين في عذاب مقيم
english: And thou wilt see them brought forward to the (Penalty), in a humble frame of mind because of (their) disgrace, (and) looking with a stealthy glance. And the Believers will say: "Those are indeed in loss, who have given to perdition their own selves and those belonging to them on the Day of Judgment. Behold! Truly the Wrong-doers are in a lasting Penalty!"
tafsir: We sent Moses with Our signs to the Pharaoh and his nobles. He said: "I have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds."

arabic: وما كان لهم من أولياء ينصرونهم من دون الله ۗ ومن يضلل الله فما له من سبيل
english: And no protectors have they to help them, other than Allah. And for any whom Allah leaves to stray, there is no way (to the Goal).
tafsir: But when he brought to them Our signs they laughed at them,

arabic: استجيبوا لربكم من قبل أن يأتي يوم لا مرد له من الله ۚ ما لكم من ملجإ يومئذ وما لكم من نكير
english: Hearken ye to your Lord, before there come a Day which there will be no putting back, because of (the Ordainment of) Allah! that Day there will be for you no place of refuge nor will there be for you any room for denial (of your sins)!
tafsir: (Even though) each miracle that We showed them was greater than the other. So We seized them with chastisement so that they may turn back.

arabic: فإن أعرضوا فما أرسلناك عليهم حفيظا ۖ إن عليك إلا البلاغ ۗ وإنا إذا أذقنا الإنسان منا رحمة فرح بها ۖ وإن تصبهم سيئة بما قدمت أيديهم فإن الإنسان كفور
english: If then they run away, We have not sent thee as a guard over them. Thy duty is but to convey (the Message). And truly, when We give man a taste of a Mercy from Ourselves, he doth exult thereat, but when some ill happens to him, on account of the deeds which his hands have sent forth, truly then is man ungrateful!
tafsir: But they said: "O sorcerer, call on your Lord for us in accordance with the compact He has made with you. We shall certainly come to guidance."

arabic: لله ملك السماوات والأرض ۚ يخلق ما يشاء ۚ يهب لمن يشاء إناثا ويهب لمن يشاء الذكور
english: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. He creates what He wills (and plans). He bestows (children) male or female according to His Will (and Plan),
tafsir: Yet no sooner did We take away the affliction from them than they broke their pledge.

arabic: أو يزوجهم ذكرانا وإناثا ۖ ويجعل من يشاء عقيما ۚ إنه عليم قدير
english: Or He bestows both males and females, and He leaves barren whom He will: for He is full of Knowledge and Power.
tafsir: And the Pharaoh said to his people: "O people, is not mine the kingdom of Egypt and these rivers that flow at my feet? Can you still not comprehend?

arabic: وما كان لبشر أن يكلمه الله إلا وحيا أو من وراء حجاب أو يرسل رسولا فيوحي بإذنه ما يشاء ۚ إنه علي حكيم
english: It is not fitting for a man that Allah should speak to him except by inspiration, or from behind a veil, or by the sending of a messenger to reveal, with Allah's permission, what Allah wills: for He is Most High, Most Wise.
tafsir: Am I (not) better than him who is contemptible, and cannot even express himself clearly?

arabic: وكذلك أوحينا إليك روحا من أمرنا ۚ ما كنت تدري ما الكتاب ولا الإيمان ولكن جعلناه نورا نهدي به من نشاء من عبادنا ۚ وإنك لتهدي إلى صراط مستقيم
english: And thus have We, by Our Command, sent inspiration to thee: thou knewest not (before) what was Revelation, and what was Faith; but We have made the (Qur'an) a Light, wherewith We guide such of Our servants as We will; and verily thou dost guide (men) to the Straight Way,-
tafsir: Why were then no bracelets of gold shed upon him from above, or angels sent down as a retinue with him?"

arabic: صراط الله الذي له ما في السماوات وما في الأرض ۗ ألا إلى الله تصير الأمور
english: The Way of Allah, to Whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on earth. Behold (how) all affairs tend towards Allah!
tafsir: Thus he made light (of the matter) to his people, and they obeyed him. They were certainly wicked.

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حم
english: Ha-Mim
tafsir: The perspicuous Book is witness

arabic: والكتاب المبين
english: By the Book that makes things clear,-
tafsir: (That) We sent it down one night of blessing -- so that We could warn --

arabic: إنا جعلناه قرآنا عربيا لعلكم تعقلون
english: We have made it a Qur'an in Arabic, that ye may be able to understand (and learn wisdom).
tafsir: On which all affairs are sorted out and decided

arabic: وإنه في أم الكتاب لدينا لعلي حكيم
english: And verily, it is in the Mother of the Book, in Our Presence, high (in dignity), full of wisdom.
tafsir: As commands from Us. It is indeed We who send (messengers),

arabic: أفنضرب عنكم الذكر صفحا أن كنتم قوما مسرفين
english: Shall We then take away the Message from you and repel (you), for that ye are a people transgressing beyond bounds?
tafsir: A mercy from your Lord. Verily He is all-hearing and all-knowing,

arabic: وكم أرسلنا من نبي في الأولين
english: But how many were the prophets We sent amongst the peoples of old?
tafsir: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, if you really do believe.

arabic: وما يأتيهم من نبي إلا كانوا به يستهزئون
english: And never came there a prophet to them but they mocked him.
tafsir: There is no god other than He, who gives you life and death, your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of old.

arabic: فأهلكنا أشد منهم بطشا ومضى مثل الأولين
english: So We destroyed (them)- stronger in power than these;- and (thus) has passed on the Parable of the peoples of old.
tafsir: Yet they are lost in doubt and play.

arabic: ولئن سألتهم من خلق السماوات والأرض ليقولن خلقهن العزيز العليم
english: If thou wert to question them, 'Who created the heavens and the earth?' They would be sure to reply, 'they were created by (Him), the Exalted in Power, Full of Knowledge';-
tafsir: So watch for the day when the sky begins to emit clear smoke,

arabic: الذي جعل لكم الأرض مهدا وجعل لكم فيها سبلا لعلكم تهتدون
english: (Yea, the same that) has made for you the earth (like a carpet) spread out, and has made for you roads (and channels) therein, in order that ye may find guidance (on the way);
tafsir: Which would envelope mankind. That would be a grievous affliction.

arabic: والذي نزل من السماء ماء بقدر فأنشرنا به بلدة ميتا ۚ كذلك تخرجون
english: That sends down (from time to time) rain from the sky in due measure;- and We raise to life therewith a land that is dead; even so will ye be raised (from the dead);-
tafsir: "O Lord, take away this torment from us," (they will pray); "we have come to believe."

arabic: والذي خلق الأزواج كلها وجعل لكم من الفلك والأنعام ما تركبون
english: That has created pairs in all things, and has made for you ships and cattle on which ye ride,
tafsir: How can a warning benefit them? The Apostle who explained all things clearly had come to them,

arabic: لتستووا على ظهوره ثم تذكروا نعمة ربكم إذا استويتم عليه وتقولوا سبحان الذي سخر لنا هذا وما كنا له مقرنين
english: In order that ye may sit firm and square on their backs, and when so seated, ye may celebrate the (kind) favour of your Lord, and say, "Glory to Him Who has subjected these to our (use), for we could never have accomplished this (by ourselves),
tafsir: But they turned away from him, and said: "He is well-instructed, (but) possessed."

arabic: وإنا إلى ربنا لمنقلبون
english: "And to our Lord, surely, must we turn back!"
tafsir: If We remove the torment a little, you revert back (to misdeeds).

arabic: وجعلوا له من عباده جزءا ۚ إن الإنسان لكفور مبين
english: Yet they attribute to some of His servants a share with Him (in his godhead)! truly is man a blasphemous ingrate avowed!
tafsir: The day that We shall seize them with a grievous hold, We will indeed castigate them.

arabic: أم اتخذ مما يخلق بنات وأصفاكم بالبنين
english: What! has He taken daughters out of what He himself creates, and granted to you sons for choice?
tafsir: We had tried the people of Pharaoh before them. A respected prophet had come to them (saying):

arabic: وإذا بشر أحدهم بما ضرب للرحمن مثلا ظل وجهه مسودا وهو كظيم
english: When news is brought to one of them of (the birth of) what he sets up as a likeness to (Allah) Most Gracious, his face darkens, and he is filled with inward grief!
tafsir: "Deliver the creatures of God to me. I am the trusted messenger sent to you.

arabic: أومن ينشأ في الحلية وهو في الخصام غير مبين
english: Is then one brought up among trinkets, and unable to give a clear account in a dispute (to be associated with Allah)?
tafsir: Do not think yourselves to be above God: I have come to you with clear authority.

arabic: وجعلوا الملائكة الذين هم عباد الرحمن إناثا ۚ أشهدوا خلقهم ۚ ستكتب شهادتهم ويسألون
english: And they make into females angels who themselves serve Allah. Did they witness their creation? Their evidence will be recorded, and they will be called to account!
tafsir: I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me to death.

arabic: وقالوا لو شاء الرحمن ما عبدناهم ۗ ما لهم بذلك من علم ۖ إن هم إلا يخرصون
english: ("Ah!") they say, "If it had been the will of (Allah) Most Gracious, we should not have worshipped such (deities)!" Of that they have no knowledge! they do nothing but lie!
tafsir: If you do not believe in me, leave me alone."

arabic: أم آتيناهم كتابا من قبله فهم به مستمسكون
english: What! have We given them a Book before this, to which they are holding fast?
tafsir: Then he called to his Lord: "These are a sinful people."

arabic: بل قالوا إنا وجدنا آباءنا على أمة وإنا على آثارهم مهتدون
english: Nay! they say: "We found our fathers following a certain religion, and we do guide ourselves by their footsteps."
tafsir: "Journey by night with My devotees," (it was said); "you will certainly be pursued.

arabic: وكذلك ما أرسلنا من قبلك في قرية من نذير إلا قال مترفوها إنا وجدنا آباءنا على أمة وإنا على آثارهم مقتدون
english: Just in the same way, whenever We sent a Warner before thee to any people, the wealthy ones among them said: "We found our fathers following a certain religion, and we will certainly follow in their footsteps."
tafsir: (Cross and) leave the sea undisturbed. The (pursuing) hosts will surely be drowned,"

arabic: قال أولو جئتكم بأهدى مما وجدتم عليه آباءكم ۖ قالوا إنا بما أرسلتم به كافرون
english: He said: "What! Even if I brought you better guidance than that which ye found your fathers following?" They said: "For us, we deny that ye (prophets) are sent (on a mission at all)."
tafsir: How many gardens and fountains did they leave behind,

arabic: فانتقمنا منهم ۖ فانظر كيف كان عاقبة المكذبين
english: So We exacted retribution from them: now see what was the end of those who rejected (Truth)!
tafsir: And fields and stately mansions,

arabic: وإذ قال إبراهيم لأبيه وقومه إنني براء مما تعبدون
english: Behold! Abraham said to his father and his people: "I do indeed clear myself of what ye worship:
tafsir: And the comfort they enjoyed.

arabic: إلا الذي فطرني فإنه سيهدين
english: "(I worship) only Him Who made me, and He will certainly guide me."
tafsir: Thus it was; and We passed them on to another people.

arabic: وجعلها كلمة باقية في عقبه لعلهم يرجعون
english: And he left it as a Word to endure among those who came after him, that they may turn back (to Allah).
tafsir: Neither did the heavens weep for them, nor the earth, nor were they granted respite.

arabic: بل متعت هؤلاء وآباءهم حتى جاءهم الحق ورسول مبين
english: Yea, I have given the good things of this life to these (men) and their fathers, until the Truth has come to them, and a messenger making things clear.
tafsir: So We saved the children of Israel from degrading suffering

arabic: ولما جاءهم الحق قالوا هذا سحر وإنا به كافرون
english: But when the Truth came to them, they said: "This is sorcery, and we do reject it."
tafsir: They (had experienced) under the Pharaoh. He was certainly a tyrant, guilty of excess.

arabic: وقالوا لولا نزل هذا القرآن على رجل من القريتين عظيم
english: Also, they say: "Why is not this Qur'an sent down to some leading man in either of the two (chief) cities?"
tafsir: And We exalted them over the other people knowingly,

arabic: أهم يقسمون رحمت ربك ۚ نحن قسمنا بينهم معيشتهم في الحياة الدنيا ۚ ورفعنا بعضهم فوق بعض درجات ليتخذ بعضهم بعضا سخريا ۗ ورحمت ربك خير مما يجمعون
english: Is it they who would portion out the Mercy of thy Lord? It is We Who portion out between them their livelihood in the life of this world: and We raise some of them above others in ranks, so that some may command work from others. But the Mercy of thy Lord is better than the (wealth) which they amass.
tafsir: And sent them tokens to bring out the best in them.

arabic: ولولا أن يكون الناس أمة واحدة لجعلنا لمن يكفر بالرحمن لبيوتهم سقفا من فضة ومعارج عليها يظهرون
english: And were it not that (all) men might become of one (evil) way of life, We would provide, for everyone that blasphemes against (Allah) Most Gracious, silver roofs for their houses and (silver) stair-ways on which to go up,
tafsir: Even then they say:

arabic: ولبيوتهم أبوابا وسررا عليها يتكئون
english: And (silver) doors to their houses, and thrones (of silver) on which they could recline,
tafsir: "There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.

arabic: وزخرفا ۚ وإن كل ذلك لما متاع الحياة الدنيا ۚ والآخرة عند ربك للمتقين
english: And also adornments of gold. But all this were nothing but conveniences of the present life: The Hereafter, in the sight of thy Lord is for the Righteous.
tafsir: So bring our ancestors back, if you are truthful."

arabic: ومن يعش عن ذكر الرحمن نقيض له شيطانا فهو له قرين
english: If anyone withdraws himself from remembrance of (Allah) Most Gracious, We appoint for him an evil one, to be an intimate companion to him.
tafsir: Are they better than the people of Tubba, and those who had lived before them, whom We destroyed as they were sinners?

arabic: وإنهم ليصدونهم عن السبيل ويحسبون أنهم مهتدون
english: Such (evil ones) really hinder them from the Path, but they think that they are being guided aright!
tafsir: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, out of play.

arabic: حتى إذا جاءنا قال يا ليت بيني وبينك بعد المشرقين فبئس القرين
english: At length, when (such a one) comes to Us, he says (to his evil companion): "Would that between me and thee were the distance of East and West!" Ah! evil is the companion (indeed)!
tafsir: We created them with definite purpose; but most of them do not understand.

arabic: ولن ينفعكم اليوم إذ ظلمتم أنكم في العذاب مشتركون
english: When ye have done wrong, it will avail you nothing, that Day, that ye shall be partners in Punishment!
tafsir: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,

arabic: أفأنت تسمع الصم أو تهدي العمي ومن كان في ضلال مبين
english: Canst thou then make the deaf to hear, or give direction to the blind or to such as (wander) in manifest error?
tafsir: The day when friend will help no friend in the least, nor will they be helped,

arabic: فإما نذهبن بك فإنا منهم منتقمون
english: Even if We take thee away, We shall be sure to exact retribution from them,
tafsir: Apart from those to whom God is kind. He is all-mighty and all-merciful.

arabic: أو نرينك الذي وعدناهم فإنا عليهم مقتدرون
english: Or We shall show thee that (accomplished) which We have promised them: for verily We shall prevail over them.
tafsir: The tree of Zaqqum will indeed be

arabic: فاستمسك بالذي أوحي إليك ۖ إنك على صراط مستقيم
english: So hold thou fast to the Revelation sent down to thee; verily thou art on a Straight Way.
tafsir: The food of sinners.

arabic: وإنه لذكر لك ولقومك ۖ وسوف تسألون
english: The (Qur'an) is indeed the message, for thee and for thy people; and soon shall ye (all) be brought to account.
tafsir: It is like pitch. It will fume in the belly

arabic: واسأل من أرسلنا من قبلك من رسلنا أجعلنا من دون الرحمن آلهة يعبدون
english: And question thou our messengers whom We sent before thee; did We appoint any deities other than (Allah) Most Gracious, to be worshipped?
tafsir: As does boiling water.

arabic: ولقد أرسلنا موسى بآياتنا إلى فرعون وملئه فقال إني رسول رب العالمين
english: We did send Moses aforetime, with Our Signs, to Pharaoh and his Chiefs: He said, "I am a messenger of the Lord of the Worlds."
tafsir: "Seize him and drag him into the depths of Hell," (it will be said),

arabic: فلما جاءهم بآياتنا إذا هم منها يضحكون
english: But when he came to them with Our Signs, behold they ridiculed them.
tafsir: "Then pour over his head the torment of scalding water."

arabic: وما نريهم من آية إلا هي أكبر من أختها ۖ وأخذناهم بالعذاب لعلهم يرجعون
english: We showed them Sign after Sign, each greater than its fellow, and We seized them with Punishment, in order that they might turn (to Us).
tafsir: "Taste it," (they will be told). "You were indeed the mighty and noble!

arabic: وقالوا يا أيه الساحر ادع لنا ربك بما عهد عندك إننا لمهتدون
english: And they said, "O thou sorcerer! Invoke thy Lord for us according to His covenant with thee; for we shall truly accept guidance."
tafsir: This is certainly what you had denied."

arabic: فلما كشفنا عنهم العذاب إذا هم ينكثون
english: But when We removed the Penalty from them, behold, they broke their word.
tafsir: Surely those who fear and follow the straight path will be in a place of peace and security

arabic: ونادى فرعون في قومه قال يا قوم أليس لي ملك مصر وهذه الأنهار تجري من تحتي ۖ أفلا تبصرون
english: And Pharaoh proclaimed among his people, saying: "O my people! Does not the dominion of Egypt belong to me, (witness) these streams flowing underneath my (palace)? What! see ye not then?
tafsir: In the midst of gardens and of springs,

arabic: أم أنا خير من هذا الذي هو مهين ولا يكاد يبين
english: "Am I not better than this (Moses), who is a contemptible wretch and can scarcely express himself clearly?
tafsir: Dressed in brocade and shot silk, facing one another.

arabic: فلولا ألقي عليه أسورة من ذهب أو جاء معه الملائكة مقترنين
english: "Then why are not gold bracelets bestowed on him, or (why) come (not) with him angels accompanying him in procession?"
tafsir: Just like that. We shall pair them with companions with large black eyes.

arabic: فاستخف قومه فأطاعوه ۚ إنهم كانوا قوما فاسقين
english: Thus did he make fools of his people, and they obeyed him: truly were they a people rebellious (against Allah).
tafsir: They will call for every kind of fruit with satisfaction.

arabic: فلما آسفونا انتقمنا منهم فأغرقناهم أجمعين
english: When at length they provoked Us, We exacted retribution from them, and We drowned them all.
tafsir: There they will not know any death apart from the first death they had died, and will be kept safe from the torment of Hell

arabic: فجعلناهم سلفا ومثلا للآخرين
english: And We made them (a people) of the Past and an Example to later ages.
tafsir: By the beneficence of your Lord. This will be the great success.

arabic: ولما ضرب ابن مريم مثلا إذا قومك منه يصدون
english: When (Jesus) the son of Mary is held up as an example, behold, thy people raise a clamour thereat (in ridicule)!
tafsir: Therefore We have made this (Qur'an) easy in your tongue. They may haply take a warning.

arabic: وقالوا أآلهتنا خير أم هو ۚ ما ضربوه لك إلا جدلا ۚ بل هم قوم خصمون
english: And they say, "Are our gods best, or he?" This they set forth to thee, only by way of disputation: yea, they are a contentious people.
tafsir: So you wait. They are also waiting.

arabic: إن هو إلا عبد أنعمنا عليه وجعلناه مثلا لبني إسرائيل
english: He was no more than a servant: We granted Our favour to him, and We made him an example to the Children of Israel.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولو نشاء لجعلنا منكم ملائكة في الأرض يخلفون
english: And if it were Our Will, We could make angels from amongst you, succeeding each other on the earth.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وإنه لعلم للساعة فلا تمترن بها واتبعون ۚ هذا صراط مستقيم
english: And (Jesus) shall be a Sign (for the coming of) the Hour (of Judgment): therefore have no doubt about the (Hour), but follow ye Me: this is a Straight Way.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولا يصدنكم الشيطان ۖ إنه لكم عدو مبين
english: Let not the Evil One hinder you: for he is to you an enemy avowed.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولما جاء عيسى بالبينات قال قد جئتكم بالحكمة ولأبين لكم بعض الذي تختلفون فيه ۖ فاتقوا الله وأطيعون
english: When Jesus came with Clear Signs, he said: "Now have I come to you with Wisdom, and in order to make clear to you some of the (points) on which ye dispute: therefore fear Allah and obey me.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: إن الله هو ربي وربكم فاعبدوه ۚ هذا صراط مستقيم
english: "For Allah, He is my Lord and your Lord: so worship ye Him: this is a Straight Way."
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فاختلف الأحزاب من بينهم ۖ فويل للذين ظلموا من عذاب يوم أليم
english: But sects from among themselves fell into disagreement: then woe to the wrong-doers, from the Penalty of a Grievous Day!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: هل ينظرون إلا الساعة أن تأتيهم بغتة وهم لا يشعرون
english: Do they only wait for the Hour - that it should come on them all of a sudden, while they perceive not?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: الأخلاء يومئذ بعضهم لبعض عدو إلا المتقين
english: Friends on that day will be foes, one to another,- except the Righteous.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: يا عباد لا خوف عليكم اليوم ولا أنتم تحزنون
english: My devotees! no fear shall be on you that Day, nor shall ye grieve,-
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: الذين آمنوا بآياتنا وكانوا مسلمين
english: (Being) those who have believed in Our Signs and bowed (their wills to Ours) in Islam.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ادخلوا الجنة أنتم وأزواجكم تحبرون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: يطاف عليهم بصحاف من ذهب وأكواب ۖ وفيها ما تشتهيه الأنفس وتلذ الأعين ۖ وأنتم فيها خالدون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وتلك الجنة التي أورثتموها بما كنتم تعملون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: لكم فيها فاكهة كثيرة منها تأكلون
english: Ye shall have therein abundance of fruit, from which ye shall have satisfaction.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: إن المجرمين في عذاب جهنم خالدون
english: The sinners will be in the Punishment of Hell, to dwell therein (for aye):
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: لا يفتر عنهم وهم فيه مبلسون
english: Nowise will the (Punishment) be lightened for them, and in despair will they be there overwhelmed.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وما ظلمناهم ولكن كانوا هم الظالمين
english: Nowise shall We be unjust to them: but it is they who have been unjust themselves.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ونادوا يا مالك ليقض علينا ربك ۖ قال إنكم ماكثون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: لقد جئناكم بالحق ولكن أكثركم للحق كارهون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: أم أبرموا أمرا فإنا مبرمون
english: What! have they settled some plan (among themselves)? But it is We Who settle things.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: أم يحسبون أنا لا نسمع سرهم ونجواهم ۚ بلى ورسلنا لديهم يكتبون
english: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private counsels? Indeed (We do), and Our messengers are by them, to record.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: قل إن كان للرحمن ولد فأنا أول العابدين

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: سبحان رب السماوات والأرض رب العرش عما يصفون
english: Glory to the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the Throne (of Authority)! (He is free) from the things they attribute (to him)!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فذرهم يخوضوا ويلعبوا حتى يلاقوا يومهم الذي يوعدون

arabic: وهو الذي في السماء إله وفي الأرض إله ۚ وهو الحكيم العليم

arabic: وتبارك الذي له ملك السماوات والأرض وما بينهما وعنده علم الساعة وإليه ترجعون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولا يملك الذين يدعون من دونه الشفاعة إلا من شهد بالحق وهم يعلمون

tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: ولئن سألتهم من خلقهم ليقولن الله ۖ فأنى يؤفكون
english: If thou ask them, who created them, they will certainly say, Allah: How then are they deluded away (from the Truth)?
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وقيله يا رب إن هؤلاء قوم لا يؤمنون
english: (Allah has knowledge) of the (Prophet's) cry, "O my Lord! Truly these are people who will not believe!"
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: فاصفح عنهم وقل سلام ۚ فسوف يعلمون
english: But turn away from them, and say "Peace!" But soon shall they know!
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حم
english: Ha-Mim.
tafsir: The revelation of this Book is from God, the mighty and all-wise.

arabic: والكتاب المبين
english: By the Book that makes things clear;-
tafsir: Indeed there are signs for believers in the heavens and the earth.

arabic: إنا أنزلناه في ليلة مباركة ۚ إنا كنا منذرين
english: We sent it down during a Blessed Night: for We (ever) wish to warn (against Evil).
tafsir: In creating you and spreading all the moving things (on earth) are signs for people firm of faith,

arabic: فيها يفرق كل أمر حكيم
english: In the (Night) is made distinct every affair of wisdom,
tafsir: As there are signs in the alternation of night and day, and in rain that God sends with which He revives the earth once dead, as there are in the changing of the winds, for people who can understand.

arabic: أمرا من عندنا ۚ إنا كنا مرسلين
english: By command, from Our Presence. For We (ever) send (revelations),
tafsir: These are revelations of God which we recite to you correctly: In what other lore but God and His manifestations would they then believe?

arabic: رحمة من ربك ۚ إنه هو السميع العليم
english: As Mercy from thy Lord: for He hears and knows (all things);
tafsir: Alas the woe for every dissembling sinner

arabic: رب السماوات والأرض وما بينهما ۖ إن كنتم موقنين
english: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them, if ye (but) have an assured faith.
tafsir: Who hears the revelations of God being recited to him, yet persists in denying with arrogance as though he had never heard them! So warn him of a painful punishment.

arabic: لا إله إلا هو يحيي ويميت ۖ ربكم ورب آبائكم الأولين
english: There is no god but He: It is He Who gives life and gives death,- The Lord and Cherisher to you and your earliest ancestors.
tafsir: When he comes to know something of Our messages he makes fun of them: For them is shameful punishment.

arabic: بل هم في شك يلعبون
english: Yet they play about in doubt.
tafsir: There is Hell before them; and whatever they have earned will not avail them in the least, nor those whom they take as friends apart from God. There is great chastisement for them.

arabic: فارتقب يوم تأتي السماء بدخان مبين
english: Then watch thou for the Day that the sky will bring forth a kind of smoke (or mist) plainly visible,
tafsir: This is guidance. Those who deny the revelations of their Lord will suffer a dreadful doom.

arabic: يغشى الناس ۖ هذا عذاب أليم
english: Enveloping the people: this will be a Penalty Grievous.
tafsir: It is God who subjugated the ocean for you so that ships may ply through it by His command, and you may seek His bounty, and may haply be grateful.

arabic: ربنا اكشف عنا العذاب إنا مؤمنون
english: (They will say:) "Our Lord! remove the Penalty from us, for we do really believe!"
tafsir: He subjugated for you whatsoever is in the heavens and the earth, each and everything. Verily there are signs in this for those who reflect.

arabic: أنى لهم الذكرى وقد جاءهم رسول مبين
english: How shall the message be (effectual) for them, seeing that an Messenger explaining things clearly has (already) come to them,-
tafsir: Tell the believers to forgive those who do not fear the visitations of God, so that He may requite the people for their deeds.

arabic: ثم تولوا عنه وقالوا معلم مجنون
english: Yet they turn away from him and say: "Tutored (by others), a man possessed!"
tafsir: He who does good does so for himself; and he who does evil suffers the consequence thereof. You have then to go back to your Lord.

arabic: إنا كاشفو العذاب قليلا ۚ إنكم عائدون
english: We shall indeed remove the Penalty for a while, (but) truly ye will revert (to your ways).
tafsir: We gave the children of Israel the Book, and the judgement and the prophethood, provided them with good things, favoured them over other people,

arabic: يوم نبطش البطشة الكبرى إنا منتقمون
english: One day We shall seize you with a mighty onslaught: We will indeed (then) exact Retribution!
tafsir: And gave them a clear exposition of Our laws. And they did not differ until after knowledge came to them, through mutual jealousies. Verily your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgement in what they differed about.

arabic: ولقد فتنا قبلهم قوم فرعون وجاءهم رسول كريم
english: We did, before them, try the people of Pharaoh: there came to them a messenger most honourable,
tafsir: We have put you on the right way in the matter (of divine law). So follow it, and do not follow the wishes of those who are ignorant.

arabic: أن أدوا إلي عباد الله ۖ إني لكم رسول أمين
english: Saying: "Restore to me the Servants of Allah: I am to you an messenger worthy of all trust;
tafsir: They will not avail you in the least against God. Surely the wicked are each other's friends, but God befriends those who fear and follow the right path.

arabic: وأن لا تعلوا على الله ۖ إني آتيكم بسلطان مبين
english: "And be not arrogant as against Allah: for I come to you with authority manifest.
tafsir: These are precepts of wisdom for men, and guidance and grace for people who believe with certainty.

arabic: وإني عذت بربي وربكم أن ترجمون
english: "For me, I have sought safety with my Lord and your Lord, against your injuring me.
tafsir: Do those who seek evil think that We shall make them equal in life and death to those who believe and do good? How bad is the judgement that they make!

arabic: وإن لم تؤمنوا لي فاعتزلون
english: "If ye believe me not, at least keep yourselves away from me."
tafsir: God has created the heavens and the earth with reason, so that He may reward each soul in accordance with what it has done; and no wrong will be done to them.

arabic: فدعا ربه أن هؤلاء قوم مجرمون
english: (But they were aggressive:) then he cried to his Lord: "These are indeed a people given to sin."
tafsir: Just think: Who apart from God can show the way to him who deifies his ego into his god, whom God allows to go astray knowingly, and seals his ears and heart, and covers over his eyes with a veil? Why then do you not contemplate?

arabic: فأسر بعبادي ليلا إنكم متبعون
english: (The reply came:) "March forth with My Servants by night: for ye are sure to be pursued.
tafsir: Yet they say: "There is nothing but the life of this world. We die and we live, and only time annihilates us." Yet they have no knowledge of this: They only speculate.

arabic: واترك البحر رهوا ۖ إنهم جند مغرقون
english: "And leave the sea as a furrow (divided): for they are a host (destined) to be drowned."
tafsir: When Our clear revelations are recited to them, their only argument is to say: "Bring our ancestors back, if what you say is true."

arabic: كم تركوا من جنات وعيون
english: How many were the gardens and springs they left behind,
tafsir: Say: "God, who gives you life and makes you die, will (raise the dead) then gather you (and your ancestors) together on the Day of Resurrection of which there is no doubt." And yet most men do not understand.

arabic: وزروع ومقام كريم
english: And corn-fields and noble buildings,
tafsir: God's is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. The day the Hour is proclaimed the liars will be losers.

arabic: ونعمة كانوا فيها فاكهين
english: And wealth (and conveniences of life), wherein they had taken such delight!
tafsir: You will see each community kneeling down; and each community will be summoned to its ledger (of good and evil deeds). You will receive upon that day your recompense for what you had done.

arabic: كذلك ۖ وأورثناها قوما آخرين
english: Thus (was their end)! And We made other people inherit (those things)!
tafsir: This, Our record, will speak about you truthfully. We had everything you did recorded in it.

arabic: فما بكت عليهم السماء والأرض وما كانوا منظرين
english: And neither heaven nor earth shed a tear over them: nor were they given a respite (again).
tafsir: So, those who believed and did good things will be admitted to His favour by their Lord. This will be a clear triumph.

arabic: ولقد نجينا بني إسرائيل من العذاب المهين
english: We did deliver aforetime the Children of Israel from humiliating Punishment,
tafsir: As for the infidels, (it will be said): "Were not My messages read out to you? But you behaved with self-conceit, and became a sinful people.

arabic: من فرعون ۚ إنه كان عاليا من المسرفين
english: Inflicted by Pharaoh, for he was arrogant (even) among inordinate transgressors.
tafsir: Whenever it was said: 'God's promise is certainly true, and there is no doubt about the Hour,' you replied: 'We know not what the Hour is. We have only a vague idea, but are not certain.'

arabic: ولقد اخترناهم على علم على العالمين
english: And We chose them aforetime above the nations, knowingly,
tafsir: The evil of what they had done will become clear to them, and they will be seized by what they had scorned.

arabic: وآتيناهم من الآيات ما فيه بلاء مبين
english: And granted them Signs in which there was a manifest trial
tafsir: "We shall ignore you today," they will be told, "as you had forgotten the meeting of this Day. Your dwelling place is Hell, and there is none to save you:

arabic: إن هؤلاء ليقولون
english: As to these (Quraish), they say forsooth:
tafsir: This because you laughed at God's revelations and were taken in by the life of the world." So they will neither be taken out of it, nor will be asked to seek God's favour on that day.

arabic: إن هي إلا موتتنا الأولى وما نحن بمنشرين
english: "There is nothing beyond our first death, and we shall not be raised again.
tafsir: All praise be to God, Lord of the heavens, Lord of the earth, Lord of all the worlds.

arabic: فأتوا بآبائنا إن كنتم صادقين
english: "Then bring (back) our forefathers, if what ye say is true!"
tafsir: His is the supremacy in the heavens and the earth; and He is the all-mighty and all-wise.

arabic: أهم خير أم قوم تبع والذين من قبلهم ۚ أهلكناهم ۖ إنهم كانوا مجرمين
english: What! Are they better than the people of Tubba and those who were before them? We destroyed them because they were guilty of sin.
tafsir: ❌ Tafsir not found

arabic: وما خلقنا السماوات والأرض وما بينهما لاعبين
english: We created not the heavens, the earth, and all between them, merely in (idle) sport:

arabic: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم حم
english: Ha-Mim.
tafsir: The revelation of this Book is from God, the mighty and all-wise.

arabic: تنزيل الكتاب من الله العزيز الحكيم
english: The revelation of the Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.
tafsir: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them but with a purpose for an appointed time. Yet the unbelievers turn away from the warning.

arabic: إن في السماوات والأرض لآيات للمؤمنين
english: Verily in the heavens and the earth, are Signs for those who believe.
tafsir: Say: "Have you thought of those you invoke apart from God? Show me what they have created of the earth, or, do they have a share in the heavens? Bring me an earlier Book than this, or inherited knowledge, if you are truthful."

arabic: وفي خلقكم وما يبث من دابة آيات لقوم يوقنون
english: And in the creation of yourselves and the fact that animals are scattered (through the earth), are Signs for those of assured Faith.
tafsir: Who is more astray than he who calls on those, apart from God, who cannot answer their prayers till the Day of Resurrection, and are even unaware of being called.

arabic: واختلاف الليل والنهار وما أنزل الله من السماء من رزق فأحيا به الأرض بعد موتها وتصريف الرياح آيات لقوم يعقلون
english: And in the alternation of Night and Day, and the fact that Allah sends down Sustenance from the sky, and revives therewith the earth after its death, and in the change of the winds,- are Signs for those that are wise.
tafsir: When all men are gathered together (on that Day) they will become their enemies and deny their worship.

arabic: تلك آيات الله نتلوها عليك بالحق ۖ فبأي حديث بعد الله وآياته يؤمنون
english: Such are the Signs of Allah, which We rehearse to thee in Truth; then in what exposition will they believe after (rejecting) Allah and His Signs?
tafsir: When Our clear revelations are read out to them, the infidels say of the truth, when it has come to them: "This is pure magic."

arabic: ويل لكل أفاك أثيم
english: Woe to each sinful dealer in Falsehoods:
tafsir: Do they say: "He has fabricated it?" Tell them: "If I have fabricated it, you have no power to save me from God. He knows what you are busy with concerning this. He is sufficient as witness between you and me; yet He is forgiving, ever-merciful."

arabic: يسمع آيات الله تتلى عليه ثم يصر مستكبرا كأن لم يسمعها ۖ فبشره بعذاب أليم
english: He hears the Signs of Allah rehearsed to him, yet is obstinate and lofty, as if he had not heard them: then announce to him a Penalty Grievous!
tafsir: Say: "I am not a new Messenger to come, nor do I know what is to be done to me or you. I only follow what is revealed to me. My duty is only to warn you clearly."

arabic: وإذا علم من آياتنا شيئا اتخذها هزوا ۚ أولئك لهم عذاب مهين
english: And when he learns something of Our Signs, he takes them in jest: for such there will be a humiliating Penalty.
tafsir: Tell them: "Think (of the consequence) if this is from God and you deny it when a witness from the people of Israel had testified to the like of it and come to believe, while you spurn it?" Assuredly God does not guide a wicked people.

arabic: من ورائهم جهنم ۖ ولا يغني عنهم ما كسبوا شيئا ولا ما اتخذوا من دون الله أولياء ۖ ولهم عذاب عظيم
english: In front of them is Hell: and of no profit to them is anything they may have earned, nor any protectors they may have taken to themselves besides Allah: for them is a tremendous Penalty.
tafsir: Those who deny say of those who believe: "Had there been any good in it they would not have preceded us in coming to it." Since they have not taken guidance from it, they will say: "This is the same old lie."

arabic: هذا هدى ۖ والذين كفروا بآيات ربهم لهم عذاب من رجز أليم
english: This is (true) Guidance and for those who reject the Signs of their Lord, is a grievous Penalty of abomination.
tafsir: There was the Book of Moses before this, a guide and a mercy; and here is this Book confirming it in lucid language, warning those who are wicked, and giving happy tidings to the righteous.

arabic: الله الذي سخر لكم البحر لتجري الفلك فيه بأمره ولتبتغوا من فضله ولعلكم تشكرون
english: It is Allah Who has subjected the sea to you, that ships may sail through it by His command, that ye may seek of his Bounty, and that ye may be grateful.
tafsir: Surely for those who say, "God is our Lord," and then remain firm, there is no fear or regret.

arabic: وسخر لكم ما في السماوات وما في الأرض جميعا منه ۚ إن في ذلك لآيات لقوم يتفكرون
